1700E - Serega the Pirate

é¦–å…ˆ \(0\) å®¹æ˜“åˆ¤ï¼Œä¸‹é¢è€ƒè™‘å¦‚ä½•åˆ¤æ–­ \(1\) å’Œ \(2\) ä»¥åŠå¯¹æ–¹æ¡ˆè®¡æ•°ã€‚

å®¹æ˜“å‘ç°æ•´ä¸ªçŸ©é˜µå¯è§£ç­‰ä»·äºå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ª \(>1\) çš„æ ¼å­éƒ½å­˜åœ¨æƒå€¼å°äºä»–çš„æ ¼å­ä¸å…¶å››è”é€šï¼Œå……åˆ†æ€§å¯ä½¿ç”¨å½’çº³è¯æ˜ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬ç°åœ¨å°±å°†é‚£äº›å››å‘¨ä¸å­˜åœ¨æ¯”ä»–å°ä¸” \(> 1\) çš„æ ¼å­ä¸ºåçš„ã€‚

ä¸€æ¬¡äº¤æ¢æˆ‘ä»¬æœ€å¤šå¯ä»¥æ”¹å˜ \(10\) ä¸ªæ ¼å­çš„çŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆä¸¤ä¸ªæœ¬èº«ï¼Œä»¥åŠä»–ä»¬å››å‘¨ï¼‰ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åç‚¹å¤šäº \(10\) ä¸ªç­”æ¡ˆå¿…ç„¶æ˜¯ Noã€‚

å¹¶ä¸”ï¼Œä¸€æ¬¡äº¤æ¢çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬äº¤æ¢çš„å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹å¿…ç„¶æ˜¯æŸä¸ªåç‚¹æˆ–å…¶æ—è¾¹çš„å››ä¸ªæ ¼å­ï¼Œä¸€å…± \(5\) ä¸ªæ ¼å­ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘æšä¸¾ä¹‹ã€‚

ç„¶å \(O(nm)\) æšä¸¾å¦ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œäº¤æ¢çš„æ—¶å€™æˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€åˆ¤æ–­

  • æ‰€æœ‰çš„åç‚¹æ˜¯å¦è¢«éƒ½è¦†ç›–åˆ°äº†ï¼ˆæœ€å¤š \(10\) ä¸ªï¼‰ï¼›
  • äº¤æ¢ä¹‹åå½±å“åˆ°çš„æ ¼å­æ˜¯å¦åˆæ³•ï¼ˆæœ€å¤š \(10\) ä¸ªï¼‰ã€‚

æ‰€ä»¥æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(nm)\)ï¼Œå¸¦ä¸€ä¸ª \(20\times 5\) çš„å¸¸æ•°ã€‚ä¸º \(1\) çš„æƒ…å†µè·‘çš„æ—¶å€™é¡ºä¾¿å°±å¯ä»¥è®¡æ•°ï¼Œå¦‚æœè·‘ä¸å‡ºæ¥é‚£ä¹ˆå°±æ˜¯ \(2\)ã€‚

å®é™…å®ç°éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„å¸¸æ•°é—®é¢˜ï¼Œä»¥åŠè·‘ç‚¹å¯¹çš„æ—¶å€™è¦å»é‡ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define il inline
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)
#define szof(a) ((int) (a).size())

using namespace std;
using pii = pair<int, int>;
int n, m, ans;
vector<vector<int> > a, vis, val;
vector<pii> bad;
const int fx[] = {1, -1, 0, 0, 0};
const int fy[] = {0, 0, -1, 1, 0};

il bool bound(int x, int y) {
    return x <= n && y <= m && x >= 1 && y >= 1;
}

il bool check(int x, int y) {
    return a[x][y] == 1 ||
           (x + 1 <= n && a[x][y] > a[x + 1][y]) ||
           (x - 1 >= 1 && a[x][y] > a[x - 1][y]) ||
           (y + 1 <= m && a[x][y] > a[x][y + 1]) ||
           (y - 1 >= 1 && a[x][y] > a[x][y - 1]);
}

bool check(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2) {
    swap(a[x1][y1], a[x2][y2]);
    int cnt = 0;
    FOR(k, 0, 4) {
        int x = x1 + fx[k], y = y1 + fy[k];
        if (!bound(x, y) || vis[x][y]) continue;
        vis[x][y] = 1, cnt += val[x][y] - (!check(x, y));
    }
    FOR(k, 0, 4) {
        int x = x2 + fx[k], y = y2 + fy[k];
        if (!bound(x, y) || vis[x][y]) continue;
        vis[x][y] = 1, cnt += val[x][y] - (!check(x, y));
    }
    FOR(k, 0, 4) {
        int x = x1 + fx[k], y = y1 + fy[k];
        if (bound(x, y)) vis[x][y] = 0;
        x = x2 + fx[k], y = y2 + fy[k];
        if (bound(x, y)) vis[x][y] = 0;
    }
    swap(a[x1][y1], a[x2][y2]);
    return cnt == bad.size();
}

unordered_set<long long> S;

int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin >> n >> m;
    a.resize(n + 1), vis.resize(n + 1), val.resize(n + 1);
    FOR(i, 1, n) {
        a[i].resize(m + 1), vis[i].resize(m + 1), val[i].resize(m + 1);
        FOR(j, 1, m) cin >> a[i][j];
    }
    FOR(x, 1, n) FOR(y, 1, m) if (!check(x, y)) bad.push_back({x, y}), val[x][y] = 1;
    if (bad.size() > 10) return puts("2"), 0;
    else if (bad.empty()) return puts("0"), 0;
    FOR(k, 0, 4) {
        int x = bad[0].first + fx[k], y = bad[0].second + fy[k];
        if (!bound(x, y)) continue;
        FOR(i, 1, n) FOR(j, 1, m) {
            long long hsh1 = ((1ll * (x - 1) * m + y) * (n * m)) + ((i - 1) * m + j),
                    hsh2 = ((1ll * (i - 1) * m + j) * (n * m)) + ((x - 1) * m + y);
            if (!S.count(hsh1) && !S.count(hsh2)) ans += check(x, y, i, j), S.insert(hsh1), S.insert(hsh2);
        }
    }
    if (!ans) puts("2");
    else printf("1 %d\n", ans);
    return 0;
}

Codeforces Round #807 (Div 2.)

1705F - Mark and the Online Exam

é¢˜æ„ï¼šçŒœä¸€ä¸ªé•¿åº¦ä¸º \(n\le 1000\) çš„ 0-1 åºåˆ—ï¼Œæœ€å¤šçŒœ \(675\) æ¬¡ï¼Œäº¤äº’åº“ä¼šè¿”å›çŒœå¯¹çš„ä½ç½®æ•°ã€‚

åŸé¢˜ï¼ŒåŸé¢˜ï¼Œé¢˜è§£ï¼Œå…¶å¯¹äº \(n=5000\) çš„é™åˆ¶ä¸º \(q\le 1026\)ï¼Œå³ \(n / \log n\) çº§åˆ«ã€‚

æ­¤å¤„æµ…ç¿»è¯‘ä¸€ä¸‹å®˜æ–¹é¢˜è§£çš„ \(q \approx 2/3n\) çš„åšæ³•ã€‚

é¦–å…ˆé¢„å¤„ç†è¯¢é—® TTT...TTT å’Œ TFTFTF...TFï¼Œç„¶åå¯¹äº \(i= 1,2,\cdots, \lfloor n /3\rfloor\)ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è½»æ¾è®¡ç®— \(2i - 1\) å’Œ \(2i\) çš„ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œå…·ä½“åœ°æˆ‘ä»¬å°†å…¶è®¾ä¸º Fï¼Œå…¶ä»–éƒ½æ˜¯ Tï¼Œç„¶åç®—å¾—çš„ç­”æ¡ˆå’Œå…¨ T çš„æ¯”è¾ƒï¼š

  • \(+2\)ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸¤ä¸ªéƒ½æ˜¯ Fã€‚
  • \(-1\)ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸¤ä¸ªéƒ½æ˜¯ Tã€‚
  • \(0\)ï¼Œåˆ™è¦ä¹ˆ FT è¦ä¹ˆ TRã€‚

å¯¹äºå¦å¤–ä¸€ç§æƒ…å†µï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡é¢å¤–çš„è¯¢é—®æ¥åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå³å°†å…¶ä¸ TFTFTF... çš„æ¯”è¾ƒï¼š \[ \begin{aligned} \mathrm{TFTF}...\mathrm{TF}...\mathrm{T}...\mathrm{TF}\\ \mathrm{TFTF}...\mathrm{\color{red}FT}...\mathrm{\color{red}F}...\mathrm{TF}\\ \end{aligned} \]

  • ç­”æ¡ˆä¸º TFTï¼Œåˆ™å·®è·ä¸º \(-3\)ï¼›
  • ç­”æ¡ˆä¸º TFFï¼Œåˆ™å·®è·ä¸º \(-1\)ï¼›
  • ç­”æ¡ˆä¸º FTTï¼Œåˆ™å·®è·ä¸º \(+1\)ï¼›
  • ç­”æ¡ˆä¸º FTFï¼Œåˆ™å·®è·ä¸º \(+3\)ï¼›

äºæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬å¾€å³è¾¹å¤šè¯¢é—®ä¸€ä½å°±å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°ç­”æ¡ˆäº†ã€‚è§£å†³ \(3\) ä¸ªä½ç½®éœ€è¦ä¸¤ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(q\) çš„çº§åˆ«å¤§æ¦‚æ˜¯ \(2/3q\)ï¼Œè¶³ä»¥é€šè¿‡æœ¬é¢˜ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int n;

int query(string s) {
    cout << s << endl;
    cout.flush();
    int x; cin >> x;
    if (x == n) puts(n > 100 ? "sb" : ""), exit(0);
    return x;
}

int main() {
    cin >> n;
    string allT(n, 'T'), ans(n, '?');
    int cntT = query(allT);

    string allTF(n, 'T');
    for (int i = 1; i < n; i += 2) allTF[i] = 'F';
    int cntTF = query(allTF);

    int l = 0, r = n - 1;
    while (r >= l) {
        if (r == l) {
            string s(allT);
            s[l] = 'F';
            int k = query(s);
            if (k > cntT) ans[l] = 'F';
            else ans[l] = 'T';
            ++l, --r;
        } else {
            string s(allT);
            s[l] = 'F', s[l + 1] = 'F';
            int k = query(s) - cntT;
            if (k == 2) {
                ans[l] = ans[l + 1] = 'F';
                l += 2;
            } else if (k == -2) {
                ans[l] = ans[l + 1] = 'T';
                l += 2;
            } else {
                if (r == l + 1) {
                    s = allT, s[l] = 'F';
                    int k = query(s);
                    if (k > cntT) ans[l] = 'F', ans[l + 1] = 'T';
                    else ans[l] = 'T', ans[l + 1] = 'F';
                    l += 2;
                } else {
                    s = allTF;
                    s[l] = 'F', s[l + 1] = 'T';
                    if (s[r] == 'F') s[r] = 'T';
                    else s[r] = 'F';

                    int k = query(s) - cntTF;
                    if (k == 3) ans[l] = 'F', ans[l + 1] = 'T', ans[r] = s[r];
                    else if (k == 1) ans[l] = 'F', ans[l + 1] = 'T', ans[r] = allTF[r];
                    else if (k == -1) ans[l] = 'T', ans[l + 1] = 'F', ans[r] = s[r];
                    else ans[l] = 'T', ans[l + 1] = 'F', ans[r] = allTF[r];

                    l += 2, --r;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    query(ans);
    return 0;
}

CodeTON Round 2

1704F - Colouring Game

åœ¨æœ‰ RB å’Œ BR çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼ŒåŒæ–¹ç­–ç•¥éƒ½æ˜¯å…ˆç›´æ¥å»æ¶ˆè¿™ä¸ªï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¿™æ ·èƒ½å°½å¯èƒ½æ¶ˆè€—å¯¹é¢çš„å­—æ¯ã€‚

ç„¶åæ²¡æœ‰ç›¸é‚»çº¢è“æ–¹æ ¼ä¹‹åï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªè‚¯å®šå°±æ˜¯åæ‰‹å¿…èƒœäº†ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥åªè€ƒè™‘ç¬¬ä¸€é˜¶æ®µï¼Œå…¬å¹³ç»„åˆæ¸¸æˆï¼Œæ±‚ SGï¼Œæ‰“è¡¨

Codeforces Round #813 (Div. 2)

1712E2 - LCM Sum (hard version)

é¢˜æ„ï¼šé—®æ»¡è¶³ \(l\le i< j < k\le r\) ä¸” \(\operatorname{lcm}(i,j,k)\ge i + j + k\) çš„ \((i,j,k)\) å¯¹æ•°ã€‚\(T\le 2\times 10^5\) ç»„è¯¢é—®ï¼Œ\(l,r\le 2\times 10^5\)ã€‚

è€ƒè™‘ E1ï¼Œå³ \(T\) å¾ˆå°çš„æƒ…å†µã€‚é¦–å…ˆè½¬åŒ–ä¸ºæ•° \([i,j,k] < i + j +k\) çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œè€Œè¿™æ ·çš„ \([i,j,k]\) æ˜¾ç„¶ \(< 3k\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å–å€¼åªèƒ½ä¸º \(k\) æˆ– \(2k\)ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆè€ƒè™‘æšä¸¾ \(k\)ï¼Œåˆ™ \([i,j,k] = k\) çš„æƒ…å†µå¾ˆå¥½å¤„ç†ï¼Œå³ \(i,j\) éœ€è¦ä¸º \(k\) çš„å› æ•°ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶æ˜¾ç„¶ \(k<i + j + k\)ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ \(O(n\log n)\) è®¡ç®—ã€‚

å¯¹äº \(\operatorname{lcm} = 2k\) çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œ\(i,j,k\) åªå¯èƒ½å½¢å¦‚ \(3t,4t,6t\) æˆ–è€… \(6t, 10t, 15t\) çš„å½¢å¼ï¼ˆæ‰“è¡¨å¯ä»¥å‘ç°ï¼‰ï¼Œä¸‹é¢ç»™å‡ºè¯æ˜ï¼š

å› ä¸º \(i+j > k \land i < j\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(j > k / 2\)ï¼Œè®¾ \(2k = j\times p\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(k/2 < 2k/p < k\)ï¼Œè§£å¾— \(2<p<4\)ï¼Œæ•… \(p = 3\)ï¼Œ\(j = 2k/3\)ã€‚ç”± \(i + j > k\)ï¼Œ\(i > k / 3\)ï¼Œè®¾ \(2k = i \times q\)ï¼Œåˆ™ \(k / 3 < 2k/q < k\)ï¼Œè§£å¾— \(3<q<6\)ï¼Œæ•… \(q= 4\) æˆ– \(5\)ï¼Œå¯¹åº”çš„ \(i = k / 2\) æˆ– \(2k / 5\)ã€‚è¯æ¯•ã€‚

æ‰€ä»¥å¯¹äº \(15\mid k\) å’Œ \(6\mid k\) çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œç‰¹åˆ¤ä¸€ä¸‹å³å¯ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define il inline
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)
#define szof(a) ((int) (a).size())

using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
const int maxn = 4e5 + 5, N = 4e5;
vector<int> fact[maxn];

ll binom(int n) {return (n - 2ll) * (n - 1ll) * n / 6;}

ll solve(int l, int r) { // count lcm(i, j, k) < i + j + k
    ll ret = 0;
    FOR(k, l + 2, r) {
        int cnt = 0;
        for (int x : fact[k]) if (x >= l && x < k) ++cnt;
        ret += cnt * (cnt - 1ll) / 2; // lcm = k
        if (k % 6 == 0 && k / 2 >= l) ++ret;
        if (k % 15 == 0 && k * 2 / 5 >= l) ++ret; // lcm = 2k
    }
    return ret;
}

int main() {
    FOR(i, 1, N) for (int j = i; j <= N; j += i) fact[j].emplace_back(i);
    int T; cin >> T;
    while (T--) {
        int l, r; cin >> l >> r;
        cout << binom(r - l + 1) - solve(l, r) << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

å¯¹äº E2ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°†ä¸Šé¢è¿™ä¸ªè¿‡ç¨‹ç¦»çº¿ä¸‹æ¥æ‰«æçº¿å³å¯ï¼Œå€’åºæšä¸¾ \(l\)ï¼Œç»´æŠ¤ \(r\) çš„ç­”æ¡ˆã€‚ç›¸å½“äºæˆ‘ä»¬å…¶å®éœ€è¦ç»´æŠ¤å› æ•°é›†åˆçš„å¤§å°ï¼Œå‘ç° \(x(x-1)/2\) å’Œ \((x+1)x/2\) ä¹‹é—´ç›¸å·® \(x\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç”¨æ ‘çŠ¶æ•°ç»„è¿˜æ˜¯æ¯”è¾ƒå¥½ç»´æŠ¤çš„ã€‚è€Œå¯¹äº \(\operatorname{lcm} = 2k\) çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œå› ä¸ºæˆ‘ä»¬æšä¸¾çš„æ˜¯ \(i\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åœ¨ \(3\mid i\) å’Œ \(6\mid i\) çš„æ—¶å€™åˆ¤ä¸€ä¸‹å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚

æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª \(n\times n\) çš„çŸ©é˜µï¼Œ\(n\le 500\)ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªä½ç½®æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼ \(v\)ï¼Œä¸” \(1\le v\le n^2\)ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡æ“ä½œå¯ä»¥é€‰æ‹©ä¸€ä¸ªå­æ–¹é˜µç„¶åç›´æ¥æŸ“è‰²ï¼Œè¦æ±‚ \(1\le x\le n^2\)ã€‚ç°åœ¨ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ª \(k\)ï¼Œé—®æœ€å°‘å¤šå°‘æ¬¡æ“ä½œä½¿å¾—çŸ©é˜µä¸­ä¸åŒçš„æ•°åˆšå¥½æœ‰ \(k\) ä¸ªã€‚

é¦–å…ˆï¼Œè®¾ä¸€å¼€å§‹æœ‰ \(m\) ç§ä¸åŒçš„æ•°ï¼Œåˆ™è‹¥ \(m \le k\)ï¼Œåˆ™æ˜¾ç„¶ç­”æ¡ˆä¸º \(k - m\)ã€‚

ç°åœ¨è€ƒè™‘ \(k < m\) çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œä¸‹é¢ç»™å‡ºç­”æ¡ˆä¸è¶…è¿‡ \(2\) çš„æ„é€ è¯æ˜ã€‚

  • é€‰ä¸€ä¸ªé•¿åº¦ä¸º \(L\) çš„å°½å¯èƒ½å¤§çš„æ­£æ–¹å½¢ï¼Œå°†é‡Œé¢å…¨éƒ¨æ¶‚ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªæœªå‡ºç°çš„é¢œè‰²ï¼Œä½¿å¾—ç°åœ¨ä¸åŒçš„æ•°æ° \(\ge k\) ä¸ªã€‚

  • ç„¶åè¿™ä¸ªæ­£æ–¹å½¢çš„å³ä¸‹è§’å¼€å§‹ï¼ˆç›¸å½“äº \((L + 1, L + 1)\) æ‰©å±•ï¼‰ï¼Œæ¶‚ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªæœªå‡ºç°çš„é¢œè‰²ï¼Œä½¿å¾—ç°åœ¨ä¸åŒçš„æ•°æ° \(\le k\) ä¸ªã€‚

    å®¹æ˜“å‘ç°è¿™æ ·ç›¸å½“äºä¸€æ¬¡æ‰©å±•ä¸¤æ ¼ï¼Œæœ€åä¸åŒçš„æ•°åªå¯èƒ½æœ‰ \(k\) ä¸ªæˆ– \(k - 1\) ä¸ªï¼Œå¯¹äºåè€…æˆ‘ä»¬æŠŠæ¶‚çš„é¢œè‰²å˜ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªå·²å‡ºç°çš„å³å¯ã€‚

äºæ˜¯åªéœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­ç­”æ¡ˆæ˜¯å¦ä¸º \(1\)ã€‚äºæ˜¯éœ€è¦å¯¹äº \(O(n^3)\) ä¸ªæ­£æ–¹å½¢æ‰¾åˆ°å…¶å®Œå…¨åŒ…å«äº†å¤šå°‘æ•°å­—ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå¯ä»¥ç”¨äºŒç»´å‰ç¼€å’Œä»€ä¹ˆçš„å¤„ç†ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚æ€»æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(n^3)\)ã€‚

å…ˆè€ƒè™‘é—®é¢˜ XIIï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥éšä¾¿æƒ³å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªç»å…¸çš„ dpï¼š \[ p(n,k) = p(n - k, k) + p(n - 1, k - 1) \] å…¶ç»„åˆæ„ä¹‰ä¸ºï¼šè€ƒè™‘æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†æ”¾ \(1\)ï¼Œæˆ–è€…é€‰æ‹©æŠŠä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªåˆ†æ‹†é‡Œé¢çš„æ•°å­—å…¨éƒ¨åŠ  \(1\)ã€‚äºæ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªä¸œè¥¿å°±å¯ä»¥ \(O(n^2)\) dpã€‚

å®šä¹‰æ¬§æ‹‰å‡½æ•°ï¼ˆåŒºåˆ«æ•°è®ºä¸­çš„æ¬§æ‹‰å‡½æ•°) \[ \phi(x) = \prod_{i=1}^{+\infty}(1 - x^i) \] åˆ™äº”è¾¹å½¢æ•°å®šç†è¯´çš„å°±æ˜¯ \[ \phi(x) = \prod_{i=-\infty}^{+\infty}(-1)^ix^{\frac{i(3i-1)}{2}} = 1 + \prod_{i=0}^{+\infty}(-1)^ix^{\frac{i(3i \pm 1)}{2}} \] è¿™éƒ¨åˆ†è¯æ˜å…¨éƒ¨å’•æ‰ã€‚

æ³¨æ„åˆ°ï¼Œæ ¹æ®ä¸Šé¢çš„ \(k\) éƒ¨åˆ†æ‹†æ•°ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è½»æ¾æ¨å‡ºåˆ†æ‹†æ•°çš„ç”Ÿæˆå‡½æ•°ä¸º \[ F(x) = \prod_{i=1}^{+\infty}\frac{1}{1 - x^i} \] å‘ç°å…¶æ»¡è¶³ \[ F(x)\phi(x) = 1 \] æˆ‘ä»¬è€ƒè™‘å±•å¼€ \([x^n]F(x)\phi(x)\)ï¼Œæœ‰ï¼š \[ p_n - p_{n - 1} - p_{n - 2} + p_{n - 5} + p_{n - 7} - \cdots = 0 \] äºæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬å°±å¾—åˆ°äº†åˆ†æ‹†æ•°çš„é€’æ¨å…¬å¼ï¼ˆè€ƒè™‘å¯¹äº \(i<0\)ï¼Œ\(p_i = 0\)ï¼‰ï¼š \[ p_n = p_{n - 1} - p_{n - 2} + p_{n - 5} + p_{n - 7} - \cdots \] ç”±äºå¹¿ä¹‰äº”è¾¹å½¢æ•°çš„å¢é•¿é€Ÿåº¦æ˜¯ \(O(n^2)\) çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ±‚åˆ†æ‹†æ•°å¯ä»¥åœ¨ \(O(n\sqrt n)\) çš„æ—¶é—´å†…è¿›è¡Œã€‚

ä¾‹é¢˜ 2ï¼šP6189 [NOI Online #1 å…¥é—¨ç»„] è·‘æ­¥

å•æ¬¡è¯¢é—®ä»»æ„æ¨¡æ•°æ‹†åˆ†æ•°ï¼Œ\(n = 10^5\)ã€‚

å¯ä»¥ç”¨ä¸Šé¢çš„æ–¹æ³•ç›´æ¥åšã€‚

const int maxn = 1e5 + 5;
int mod, n, p[maxn], g[maxn], m;

int main() {
    read(n, mod);
    p[0] = 1;
    for (int i = 1; i * (3 * i - 1) / 2 <= n; ++i) g[m++] = i * (3 * i - 1) / 2, g[m++] = i * (3 * i + 1) / 2;
    FOR(i, 1, n) for (int j = 0; j < m && g[j] <= i; ++j) p[i] = (p[i] + (((j >> 1) & 1) ? -1ll : 1ll) * p[i - g[j]]) % mod;
    print((p[n] + mod) % mod);
    return output(), 0;
}

ll mul(ll a, ll b, ll mod) {
    ll ans = 0, x = a;
    b = (b + mod) % mod, a = (a + mod) % mod;
    for (; b; b >>= 1ll) {
        if (b & 1ll)
            ans = (ans + x) % mod;
        x = (x << 1) % mod;
    }
    return ans;
}

typedef long long ll;
typedef long double ldb;

il ll mul(ll a, ll b, ll mod) {

}

int exgcd(int a, int b, int &x, int &y) {
    if (!b) {
        x = 1, y = 0;
        return a;
    }
    int d = exgcd(b, a % b, y, x);
    y -= a / b * x;
    return d;
}

  • \(p > \sqrt[4]x\) æ—¶ï¼š
    • \(a_0 = 1\) æ—¶ï¼Œæœ‰ \(a_0p = p\le \sqrt x\)ã€‚
    • \(a_0\ne 1\) æ—¶ï¼Œç”±äº \(x\) ä¸ä¸ºç´ æ•°ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(\dfrac xp\) çš„æœ€å°è´¨å› å­ \(q\) å³ä¸º \(x\) çš„ç¬¬äºŒå°è´¨å› å­ï¼Œä¸€å®š \(\ge p\)ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬åˆå¯ä»¥çŸ¥é“ \(p \le q\le a_0\le b_0\le c_0\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(pa_0b_0c_0 > (\sqrt[4]x)^4 = x\) ä¸ \(pa_0b_0c_0 = x\) çŸ›ç›¾ï¼Œæ•…è¯¥æƒ…å†µä¸å­˜åœ¨ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆçº¿æ€§ç­›çš„æ—¶å€™é¡ºå¸¦ç”¨æœ€å°è´¨å› å­æ›´æ–°ï¼Œé¢„å¤„ç† \(\sqrt N\) èŒƒå›´çš„ \(\gcd\) æ•°ç»„å³å¯ã€‚ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

const int N = 1e6, T = 1e3, maxn = 5005;
int isp[N + 5], p[N + 5], cnt;
int fac[N + 5][3], _gcd[T + 5][T + 5];

void sieve() {
    fac[1][0] = fac[1][1] = fac[1][2] = 1;
    FOR(i, 2, N) {
        if (!isp[i]) p[++cnt] = i, fac[i][0] = fac[i][1] = 1, fac[i][2] = i;
        for (int j = 1; i * p[j] <= N && j <= cnt; ++j) {
            int tmp = i * p[j];
            isp[tmp] = 1;
            fac[tmp][0] = fac[i][0] * p[j];
            fac[tmp][1] = fac[i][1], fac[tmp][2] = fac[i][2];
            if (fac[tmp][0] > fac[tmp][1]) myswap(fac[tmp][0], fac[tmp][1]);
            if (fac[tmp][1] > fac[tmp][2]) myswap(fac[tmp][1], fac[tmp][2]);
            if (i % p[j] == 0) break;
        }
    }
    FOR(i, 0, T) _gcd[i][0] = _gcd[0][i] = i;
    FOR(i, 1, T)
        FOR(j, 1, i)
            _gcd[i][j] = _gcd[j][i] = _gcd[j][i % j];
    return;
}

int gcd(int x, int y) {
    int ans = 1;
    FOR(i, 0, 2) {
        int d;
        if (fac[x][i] <= T) d = _gcd[fac[x][i]][y % fac[x][i]];
        else if (y % fac[x][i] == 0) d = fac[x][i];
        else d = 1;
        y /= d;
        ans *= d;
    }
    return ans;
}

è¯¥é—®é¢˜è¾ƒä¸ºå¤æ‚ï¼Œä¸å¦¨ä¸€æ­¥æ­¥è€ƒè™‘èµ·ã€‚å‡è®¾ \(a\ge c\lor b\ge c\)ï¼Œåˆ™æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å…ˆå°† \(a\) å’Œ \(b\) å¯¹ \(c\) å–æ¨¡ï¼Œå³ \[ \begin{aligned} f(a, b, c, n) &= \sum_{i = 0}^n\left\lfloor\frac{ai + b}{c}\right\rfloor\\ &= \sum_{i = 0}^n\left\lfloor\frac{(\left\lfloor\frac a c\right\rfloor c + a\bmod c)i + \left\lfloor\frac b c\right\rfloor c + b\bmod c}{c}\right\rfloor\\ &= \frac{n(n + 1)}{2}\left\lfloor\frac ac\right\rfloor + (n + 1)\left\lfloor\frac bc\right\rfloor + f(a\bmod c, b\bmod c, c, n) \end{aligned} \] ç„¶åé—®é¢˜å°±å˜æˆäº† \(a,b< c\) çš„å½¢å¼ã€‚

å†™æˆä»£ç å°±æ˜¯ä¸‹é¢è¿™æ ·ï¼Œè¾¹ç•Œæ˜¯ \(a = 0\)ï¼š

int f(int a, int b, int c, int n) {
    if (!a) return b / c * (n + 1);
    if (a >= c || b >= c) return n * (n + 1) / 2 * (a / c) + (n + 1) * (b / c) + f(a % c, b % c, c, n);
    int m = (a * n + b) / c;
    return n * m - f(c, c - b - 1, a, m - 1);
}

æ ¹æ®ä¸‹æ–‡æåˆ°çš„è´¹é©¬å°å®šç†ï¼Œå¯¹äºè´¨æ•° \(p\) å’Œæ­£æ•´æ•° \(a < p\) ä¸€å®šæœ‰ \(a^{p - 1}\equiv 1\pmod p\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸ºäº†åˆ¤æ–­ \(n\) çš„ç´ æ€§ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¸æ–­é€‰å– \([2, n - 1]\) ä¸­çš„åŸº \(a\) ç„¶ååˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æœ‰ \(a^{n - 1}\equiv 1\)ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬å°±å°† Fermat ç´ æ€§æµ‹è¯•å’ŒäºŒæ¬¡æ¢æµ‹å®šç†è”åˆèµ·æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘å°† \(n - 1\) åˆ†è§£æˆ \(u\times 2^t\)ï¼Œç„¶åå…ˆæ±‚å‡º \(a^u\pmod n\)ï¼Œä¹‹åå¯¹ä»–è¿›è¡Œ \(t\) æ¬¡å¹³æ–¹æ“ä½œï¼Œè‹¥ä¸­é€”å‘ç°éå¹³å‡¡å¹³æ–¹æ ¹åˆ™å…¶ä¸æ˜¯ç´ æ•°ï¼Œå¦åˆ™é€šè¿‡æœ¬è½®æµ‹è¯•ã€‚

å– \(A = \{2,3,5,7,11,13,17,19,23\}\) ä¾¿å¯é€šè¿‡ç»å¤§éƒ¨åˆ†æ•°æ®ã€‚ç»™æˆ‘èƒŒæ¿å­ï¼

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)

using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
const ll a[10] = {2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13, 17, 19, 23};

ll qPow(ll base, ll exp, ll mod) {
    ll ret = 1;
    for (; exp; exp >>= 1, base = __int128(base) * base % mod)
        if (exp & 1) ret = __int128(ret) * base % mod;
    return ret;
}

bool isPrime(ll n) {
    FOR(i, 0, 8) if (n == a[i]) return true;
    if (n < 2 || !(n & 1)) return false;
    ll t = 0, u = n - 1, j;
    while (!(u & 1)) u >>= 1, ++t;
    FOR(i, 0, 8) {
        ll v = qPow(a[i], u, n);
        if (v == 1) continue;
        for (j = 1; j <= t; ++j) {
            if (v == n - 1) break;
            v = __int128(v) * v % n;
        }
        if (j > t) return false;
    }
    return true;
}

int main() {
    ll x;
    while (cin >> x) puts(isPrime(x) ? "Y" : "N");
    return 0;
}

template<typename T> T rnd(T l, T r = 0) {

ll findFact(ll n) {

}

â€œé¾Ÿå…”èµ›è·‘â€ã€‚ç”¨ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•° \(t\) å’Œ \(r\)ï¼Œåˆå§‹æ—¶ \(t = r = 1\)ï¼Œç„¶åæ¯æ¬¡å…”å­è·³ä¸¤æ ¼ï¼Œä¹Œé¾Ÿèµ°ä¸€æ­¥ï¼š\(x_t = x_i\)ï¼Œ\(x_{r} = x_{2i}\)ã€‚æ³¨æ„åˆ°ä»–ä»¬è¿Ÿæ—©æ˜¯ä¼šç›¸é‡çš„ã€‚

ll findFact(ll n) {
    ll c = rnd(1, n - 1);
    ll t = f(0, c, n), r = f(f(0, c, n), c, n);
    while (t != r) {
        ll d = gcd(myabs(t - r), n);
        if (d > 1) return 1;
        t = f(t, c, n), r = f(f(r, c, n), c, n);
    }
    return n;
}

ä¼˜åŒ–

è€ƒè™‘è‹¥ \(\gcd(x, n)>1\) åˆ™ \(\gcd(xy, n) > 1\)ï¼Œæ›´è¿›ä¸€æ­¥çš„æœ‰ \(\gcd(xy\bmod n, n) > 1\)ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥å¯ä»¥å°†æ‰€æœ‰çš„ \(|t - r|\) åœ¨æ¨¡æ„ä¹‰ä¸‹ç›¸ä¹˜ï¼Œå†åš \(\gcd\)ã€‚

è€ƒè™‘å€å¢ä»¥é¿å… \(\gcd\) è¿‡å¤šæˆ–è€…åœ¨ç¯ä¸Šåœç•™è¿‡ä¹…ã€‚

ll findFact(ll n) {
    ll c = rnd(1, n - 1);
    ll s = 0, t = 0;
    int step = 0, goal = 1;
    ll val = 1;
    for (goal = 1; ; goal <<= 1, s = t, val = 1) {
        for (step = 1; step <= goal; ++step) {
            t = f(t, c, n);
            val = __int128(val) * myabs(t - s) % n;
            if (step % 127 == 0) {
                ll d = gcd(val, n);
                if (d > 1) return d;
            }
        }
        ll d = gcd(val, n);
        if (d > 1) return d;
    }
    return n;
}

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ Library Checker è´¨å› æ•°åˆ†è§£çš„æ¨¡æ¿å®ç°ï¼š

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = (a); i <= (b); ++i)

using namespace std;

using ll = long long;
const ll a[10] = {2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13, 17, 19, 23};
vector<ll> ans;

ll qPow(ll base, ll exp, ll mod) {
    ll ret = 1;
    for (; exp; exp >>= 1, base = __int128(base) * base % mod)
        if (exp & 1) ret = __int128(ret) * base % mod;
    return ret;
}

bool isPrime(ll n) {
    FOR(i, 0, 8) if (a[i] == n) return true;
    if (n < 2 || !(n & 1)) return false;
    ll t = 0, u = n - 1;
    while (!(u & 1)) u >>= 1, ++t;
    FOR(i, 0, 8) {
        ll v = qPow(a[i], u, n), j;
        if (v == 1) continue;
        for (j = 1; j <= t; ++j) {
            if (v == n - 1) break;
            v = __int128(v) * v % n;
        }
        if (j > t) return false;
    }
    return true;
}

ll f(ll x, ll c, ll mod) {return (__int128(x) * x % mod + c) % mod;}
ll rnd(ll l, ll r = 0) {
    static mt19937_64 eng(20041031);
    if (l > r) swap(l, r);
    uniform_int_distribution<ll> dis(l, r);
    return dis(eng);
}

ll pollardRho(ll n) {
    ll c = rnd(1, n - 1);
    ll s = 0, t = 0, val = 1;
    int step = 0, goal = 1;
    for (goal = 1; ; goal <<= 1, s = t, val = 1) {
        for (step = 1; step <= goal; ++step) {
            t = f(t, c, n);
            val = __int128(val) * __builtin_llabs(s - t) % n;
            if (step % 127 == 0) {
                ll d = __gcd(val, n);
                if (d > 1) return d;
            }
        }
        ll d = __gcd(val, n);
        if (d > 1) return d;
    }
}

vector<ll> work(ll n) {
    if (n < 2) return {};
    if (isPrime(n)) return {n};
    ll p = n;
    while (p >= n) p = pollardRho(n);
    vector<ll> tmp = work(p), ret;
    while (n % p == 0) {
        for (auto &x : tmp) ret.emplace_back(x);
        n /= p;
    }
    tmp = work(n);
    for (auto &x : tmp) ret.emplace_back(x);
    return ret;
}

int main() {
    int T; cin >> T;
    while (T--) {
        ll n; cin >> n;
        auto ans = work(n);
        sort(ans.begin(), ans.end());
        cout << ans.size() << ' ';
        for (auto &x : ans) cout << x << ' ';
        cout << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

    int phi(int n) {
    int ans = n;
    for (int i = 2; i * i <= n; ++i)
        if (n % i == 0) {
            ans = ans / i * (i - 1);
            while (n % i == 0) n /= i;
        }
    if (n > 1) ans = ans / n * (n - 1);
    return ans;
}

    void init() {
    phi[1] = 1;

        if (!vis[i]) {

}

è¯æ˜

é¦–å…ˆï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ˜“çŸ¥ \(\forall j\in[1,n]\)ï¼Œå½“ \(i\neq j\) æ—¶æœ‰

#include <cstdio>

typedef long long ll;
ll n, a[15], m[15], Mul, M[16], inv[16], x, y;

void exgcd(ll a, ll b, ll& x, ll& y) {
    if (b == 0) {
        x = 1; y = 0;
        return;
    }
    exgcd(b, a % b, y, x);
    y -= a / b * x;
}

int main() {
    Mul = 1;
    scanf("%lld", &n);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        scanf("%lld %lld", m + i, a + i);
        Mul *= m[i];
    }
    ll ans = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        M[i] = Mul / m[i];
        x = 0, y = 0;
        exgcd(M[i], m[i], x, y);
        inv[i] = x < 0 ? x + m[i] : x;
        ans += a[i] * M[i] * inv[i];
    }
    printf("%lld\n", ans % Mul);
    return 0;
}

çº¿æ€§åŒä½™æ–¹ç¨‹çš„åˆå¹¶ï¼ˆexCRTï¼‰

å½“ \[ \begin{cases} x\equiv r_1\pmod{m_1}\\ x\equiv r_2\pmod{m_2}\\ \cdots\\ x\equiv r_n\pmod{m_n} \end{cases} \] ä¸­çš„æ¨¡æ•°ä¸ä¸¤ä¸¤äº’è´¨æ—¶ï¼ŒCRT éœ€è¦çš„ \(M_i\) æ¨¡ \(m_i\) çš„é€†å…ƒå°±ä¸ä¸€å®šå­˜åœ¨ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬çš„æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯ï¼šä¸¤ä¸¤åˆå¹¶è¿™äº›æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼Œæœ€åç”¨ exgcd æ±‚è§£ã€‚

å…ˆè€ƒè™‘ä¸¤ä¸ªæœªçŸ¥æ•°çš„æƒ…å†µï¼š \[ \begin{cases} x\equiv r_1\pmod{m_1} \\ x\equiv r_2\pmod{m_2} \\ \end{cases} \] è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹ç¨‹å¯ä»¥æ”¹å†™ä¸ºï¼š

\[ x=k_1m_1+r_1=k_2m_2+r_2 \]

\[ k_1p_1-k_2p_2 = \frac{r_2-r_1}{d} \]

ä½¿ç”¨ exgcd æ±‚å‡ºæ–¹ç¨‹ \(p_1\lambda_1 + p_2\lambda_2 = 1\) çš„è§£ \(\lambda_1,\lambda_2\)ï¼Œåˆ™

\[ \begin{cases} k_1=\lambda_1\cdot\dfrac{r_2-r_1}{d} \\ k_2=\lambda_2\cdot\dfrac{r_2-r_1}{d} \end{cases} \]

æŠŠ \(k_1\) è¿˜åŸå›å»ï¼Œå¾—åˆ°æ»¡è¶³åŸæ–¹ç¨‹çš„ä¸€ä¸ªç‰¹è§£

\[ x^* = m_1\lambda_1\cdot\dfrac{r_2-r_1}{d} + r_1 \]

åˆ™è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹ç¨‹æ‰€æœ‰çš„é€šè§£ä¸º $x = x^* + k(m_1,m_2),k $ã€‚

æ‰€ä»¥ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–¹ç¨‹å°±åˆå¹¶ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªï¼š

int lucas(int n, int m)
{
    if (!m) return 1;
    return 1ll * lucas(n / p, m / p) * C(n % p, m % p) % p;
}

\[ \binom n m \equiv \frac{n!}{m!(n - m)!}\pmod{p^k} \] ç„¶è€Œä¸‹é¢é‚£ä¸ªä¸œè¥¿ä¸ä¸€å®šèƒ½ç®—æ¨¡ \(p^k\) æ„ä¹‰ä¸‹çš„ä¹˜æ³•é€†å…ƒï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬å°±æŠŠæ‰€æœ‰çš„ \(p\) æå‡ºæ¥ï¼Œè®¾ \(f(n) = \frac{n!}{p^{\nu(n!)}}\)ï¼Œ\(\nu(n)\) ä¸Šé¢å·²ç»è¯´æ˜ã€‚æå‡ºæ¥ä¹‹åå°±å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ° \(f(n)\not\equiv 0\pmod{p^k}\)ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ±‚é€†ã€‚ç°åœ¨å°±éœ€è¦è®¡ç®— \[ \frac{f(n)}{f(m)f(n - m)}p^{\nu(n!) - \nu(m!) - \nu((n - m)!)} \] ä¸Šæ–‡è¯´è¿‡äº† \(\nu(n!) = \sum_{i\ge 1}\lfloor n /p^i\rfloor\)ï¼Œä¸‹é¢è€ƒè™‘å¦‚ä½•æ±‚ \(f(n)\)ã€‚

äºæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬å°±åšå®Œäº†ã€‚æ¥çœ‹ä¸‹ä»£ç ï¼šæ´›è°· P4720 ã€æ¨¡æ¿ã€‘æ‰©å±•å¢å¡æ–¯ï¼Œç»†èŠ‚å·¨å¤§å¤šã€‚ä¸‹é¢çš„å†™æ³•ï¼Œä¸€æ¬¡è¯¢é—®çš„å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º \(O(M\log M)\)ã€‚

using ll = long long;
ll n, m, mod;

void exgcd(ll a, ll b, ll &x, ll &y) {
    if (!b) return x = 1, y = 0, void();
    exgcd(b, a % b, y, x), y -= a / b * x;
    return;
}

il ll inv(ll n, ll mod) {
    ll x, y;
    exgcd(n, mod, x, y);
    return (x + mod) % mod;
}

ll qPow(ll base, ll exp, ll mod) {
    ll ret = 1;
    for (; exp; exp >>= 1, base = base * base % mod)
        if (exp & 1) ret = ret * base % mod;
    return ret;
}

ll CRT(int n, ll *a, ll *m) {
    ll M = 1, ret = 0;
    FOR(i, 1, n) M *= m[i];
    FOR(i, 1, n) {
        ll w = M / m[i];
        ret = (ret + a[i] * w % mod * inv(w, m[i]) % mod) % mod;
    }
    return (ret + mod) % mod;
}

ll f(ll n, ll p, ll pk) {
    if (!n) return 1;
    ll ret = 1;
    FOR(i, 1, pk) if (i % p) ret = ret * i % pk;
    ret = qPow(ret, n / pk, pk);
    for (ll i = n / pk * pk + 1; i <= n; ++i)
        if (i % p) ret = ret * (i % pk) % pk;
    return ret * f(n / p, p, pk) % pk;
}

ll multiLucas(ll n, ll m, ll p, ll pk) {
    int cnt = 0;
    for (ll i = n; i; i /= p) cnt += i / p;
    for (ll i = m; i; i /= p) cnt -= i / p;
    for (ll i = n - m; i; i /= p) cnt -= i / p;
    return qPow(p, cnt, pk) * f(n, p, pk) % pk * inv(f(m, p, pk), pk) % pk * inv(f(n - m, p, pk), pk) % pk;
}


ll exLucas(ll n, ll m, ll p) {
    int cnt = 0;
    ll pk[20], a[20];
    for (ll i = 2; i * i <= p; ++i) {
        if (p % i == 0) {
            pk[++cnt] = 1;
            while (p % i == 0) pk[cnt] *= i, p /= i;
            a[cnt] = multiLucas(n, m, i, pk[cnt]);
        }
    }
    if (p > 1) pk[++cnt] = p, a[cnt] = multiLucas(n, m, p, p);
    return CRT(cnt, a, pk);
}

int main() {
    read(n, m, mod);
    print(exLucas(n, m, mod));
    return output(), 0;
}

ï¼ˆè™½ç„¶çœ‹ä¸å‡º \(\gcd\) é‚£ä¸ªæœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆåµç”¨ï¼‰

BSGS

Baby-Step-Giant-Stepï¼ˆå¤§æ­¥å°æ­¥ç®—æ³•ï¼ŒBSGSï¼‰å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥æ±‚è§£ \(a\perp m\) çš„ç¦»æ•£å¯¹æ•°ã€‚

é¦–å…ˆç”±è´¹é©¬å°å®šç†å¯ä»¥çŸ¥é“ç­”æ¡ˆä¸€å®šåœ¨ \([1, m - 1]\) ä¹‹é—´ã€‚

ç„¶åè®¾ \(x = i\sqrt m - j\)ï¼Œåˆ™ \(a^{i\sqrt m -j}\equiv b\pmod m\)ï¼Œå³ \(a^{i\sqrt m} \equiv ba^j\pmod m\)ï¼Œè€Œ \(i\) å’Œ \(j\) éƒ½æ˜¯ \(\sqrt m\) çº§åˆ«çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è€ƒè™‘åœ¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ä¸­é¢„å¤„ç†æ¯ä¸ª \(ba^j\)ï¼Œç„¶åæšä¸¾ \(i\) åˆ¤æ–­ \(a^{i\sqrt m}\) æ˜¯å¦åœ¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨å†…å‡ºç°è¿‡å³å¯ã€‚

#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <unordered_map>
#define R register
#define FOR(i, a, b) for(R int i = a; i <= b; ++i)
#define int long long

std::unordered_map<int, int> hash;

int ksm(int base, int p, int mod) {
    int ans = 1;
    for (; p; p >>= 1) {
        if (p & 1)
            ans = ans * base % mod;
        base = base * base % mod;
    }
    return ans;
}

int BSGS(int a, int b, int p) {
    hash.clear();
    if (a % p == 0)
        return -1;
    int t = ceil(sqrt(p)), val, tmp;
    hash[val = b] = 0;
    FOR(j, 1, t)
        hash[val = val * a % p] = j;
    a = ksm(a, t, p), val = 1;
    FOR(i, 1, t) {
        val = val * a % p;
        if (tmp = hash[val])
            return val = i * t - tmp, (val % p + p) % p;
    }
    return -1;
}

signed main() {
    int p, a, b;
    scanf("%lld %lld %lld", &p, &a, &b);
    int ans = BSGS(a, b, p);
    if (ans >= 0)
        return printf("%lld\n", ans), 0;
    else return printf("no solution\n"), 0;
}

exBSGS

å½“ \(a\) å’Œ \(m\) ä¸äº’è´¨çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œåœ¨æ¨¡ \(m\) æ„ä¹‰ä¸‹ \(a\) çš„é€†å…ƒä¸ä¸€å®šå­˜åœ¨ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥è€ƒè™‘å¼ºè¡Œè®©ä»–äº’è´¨ã€‚

è®¾ \(d_1 = \gcd(a, p)\)ï¼Œè‹¥ \(d_1\not\mid b\)ï¼Œåˆ™æ— è§£ã€‚å¦åˆ™å°†æ–¹ç¨‹åŒæ—¶é™¤ä»¥ \(d_1\)ï¼š \[ \frac{a}{d_1}\cdot a^{x-1}\equiv \frac{b}{d_1}\pmod {\frac{p}{d_1}} \] è‹¥ \(a\) å’Œ \(\dfrac{p}{d_1}\) ä»ç„¶ä¸äº’è´¨å°±æ¥ç€ä¸Šé¢çš„æµç¨‹ã€‚ç›´åˆ° \(a\perp \dfrac{p}{\prod d_i}\)ã€‚

è®°æ‰€æœ‰çš„ \(\displaystyle\frac{b}{\prod d} = B, \frac{p}{\prod d} = P,\prod\frac a d = A\)ï¼Œåˆ™æ–¹ç¨‹æœ€åå˜ä¸º

\[ Aa^{x - k}\equiv B\pmod P \]

æ­¤æ—¶ \(A\perp P\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬å°±å¯ä»¥æ„‰å¿«åœ°æ±‚å‡º \(A^{-1}\pmod P\) ç„¶åæŠŠä»–ä¹˜åˆ°å³è¾¹æ¥ï¼Œæ–¹ç¨‹å°±åŒ–ä¸º

\[ a^{x - k}\equiv A^{-1}B\pmod P \]

ç”¨ BSGS æ±‚å‡ºè¯¥æ–¹ç¨‹çš„è§£å³å¯ï¼Œç„¶åè®°å¾—åŠ å› \(k\)ã€‚

ç»†èŠ‚ï¼šå¦‚æœ \(a = 1\or p = 1\)ï¼Œæœ€å°è‡ªç„¶æ•°è§£å¿…ç„¶ä¸º \(0\)ï¼Œç„¶åå¦‚æœåœ¨é€’å½’çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç° \(A=B\)ï¼Œåˆ™è¯´æ˜ \(x = k\)ï¼Œå¯ç›´æ¥è¿”å›ç­”æ¡ˆã€‚

#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <unordered_map>
#define R register
#define FOR(i, a, b) for(R int i = a; i <= b; ++i)
#define int long long

std::unordered_map<int, int> hash;

int ksm(int base, int p, int mod) {
    int ans = 1;
    for (; p; p >>= 1) {
        if (p & 1)
            ans = ans * base % mod;
        base = base * base % mod;
    }
    return ans;
}

int exgcd(int a, int b, int& x, int& y) {
    if (!b)
        return x = 1, y = 0, a;
    int tmp = exgcd(b, a % b, y, x);
    return y -= a / b * x, tmp;
}

int inv(int a, int mod) {
    int x, y;
    exgcd(a, mod, x, y);
    return (x % mod + mod) % mod;
}

int BSGS(int a, int b, int p) {
    hash.clear();
    if (a % p == 0)
        return -1;
    int t = ceil(sqrt(p)), val, tmp;
    hash[val = b] = 0;
    FOR(j, 1, t)
        hash[val = val * a % p] = j;
    a = ksm(a, t, p), val = 1;
    FOR(i, 1, t) {
        val = val * a % p;
        if (tmp = hash[val])
            return val = i * t - tmp, (val % p + p) % p;
    }
    return -1;
}

int exBSGS(int a, int b, int p) {
    if (a == 1 || p == 1)
        return 0;
    int x, y, k = 0, na = 1, g = exgcd(a, p, x, y);
    while (g > 1) {
        if (b % g)
            return -1;//åˆ¤æ— è§£
        ++k, b /= g, p /= g, na = (na * (a / g)) % p;//é€’å½’
        if (na == b)//ç‰¹åˆ¤å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥è¿”å›ç­”æ¡ˆçš„æƒ…å†µ
            return k;
        g = exgcd(a, p, x, y);
    }
    int ans = BSGS(a, b * inv(na, p) % p, p);
    return ans == -1 ? -1 : ans + k;
}

signed main() {
    int a, p, b;
    for (scanf("%lld %lld %lld", &a, &p, &b); a || b || p; scanf("%lld %lld %lld", &a, &p, &b)) {
        int ans = exBSGS(a % p, b % p, p);
        if (ans > 0)
            printf("%lld\n", ans);
        else printf("No Solution\n");
    }
    return 0;
}

äºŒæ¬¡å‰©ä½™

æ±‚è§£ \(x^2\equiv a\pmod m\)ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ \(m\) ä¸ºå¥‡ç´ æ•°ã€‚è‹¥ \(x\) å­˜åœ¨åˆ™ç§° \(x\) ä¸ºæ¨¡ \(m\) çš„äºŒæ¬¡å‰©ä½™ã€‚

è§£çš„æ•°é‡

\(x^2\equiv m\) çš„è§£ï¼Ÿæˆ‘ä»¬è‚¯å®šçŸ¥é“ \(x_0^2\equiv x_1^2\)ã€‚ç§»é¡¹ï¼Œå¹³æ–¹å·®ï¼Œæœ‰ \((x_0 - x_1) (x_0 + x_1) \equiv 0\)ã€‚å› ä¸º \(x_0 - x_1\not\equiv0\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(x_0\) å’Œ \(x_1\) äº’ä¸ºç›¸åæ•°ã€‚\(p\) ä¸ºå¥‡ç´ æ•°æ—¶æ¨¡æ„ä¹‰ä¸‹çš„ç›¸åæ•°å°±è‚¯å®šä¸ä¼šç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œè€Œä¸”å¥‡å¶æ€§ä¸åŒã€‚

ä»»æ„ä¸€å¯¹ç›¸åæ•°éƒ½ä¼šå¯¹åº”ä¸€ä¸ªäºŒæ¬¡å‰©ä½™ï¼Œæ•…æ¨¡ \(m\) æ„ä¹‰ä¸‹çš„äºŒæ¬¡å‰©ä½™ä¸€å…±æœ‰ \(\dfrac{m - 1}{2}\) ä¸ªï¼Œå…¶ä½™çš„éé›¶æ•°éƒ½æ˜¯éäºŒæ¬¡å‰©ä½™ã€‚

æ¬§æ‹‰å‡†åˆ™

Euler åˆ¤åˆ«å‡†åˆ™ï¼š\(a\) ä¸ºæ¨¡ \(m\) çš„äºŒæ¬¡å‰©ä½™ç­‰ä»·äº \(a^{\frac{m - 1}{2}}\equiv 1\pmod m\)ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ \(a^{\frac{m - 1}{2}}\equiv -1\pmod m\)ã€‚

è€ƒè™‘è´¹é©¬å°å®šç†ï¼š\(a^{m - 1}\equiv 1\pmod m\)ï¼Œç”±äº \(m\) ä¸ºå¥‡ç´ æ•°ï¼Œæ•… \(a^{2\times\frac{m - 1}{2}}\equiv 1\pmod m\)ï¼Œç›¸å½“äº \(a^{\frac{m - 1}{2}}\) æ˜¯ \(1\)â€œå¼€æ ¹â€åçš„ç»“æœï¼Œæ ¹æ®äºŒæ¬¡æ¢æµ‹å®šç†ï¼ˆä¸Šæ–‡ Miller-Rabin å¤„ï¼‰å…¶åªå¯èƒ½ä¸º \(\pm 1\)ã€‚

è€ƒè™‘è¯æ˜å……åˆ†æ€§ï¼šè‹¥ \(a\) æ˜¯äºŒæ¬¡å‰©ä½™ï¼Œåˆ™ \(a^{\frac{m - 1}{2}}\equiv (x^2)^{\frac{m-1}{2}}\equiv x^{m - 1}\equiv 1\pmod m\)ï¼Œè¯æ¯•ã€‚

è€ƒè™‘è¯æ˜å¿…è¦æ€§ï¼šè‹¥ \(a^{\frac{m-1}{2}}\equiv 1\pmod m\)ï¼Œåˆ™å°† \(a\) è¡¨ç¤ºä¸º \(g^k\)ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ \(g\) ä¸ºæ¨¡ \(m\) çš„åŸæ ¹ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæœ‰ \(g^{k\frac{m-1}{2}}\equiv 1\)ï¼Œç”±äº \(g\) æ˜¯åŸæ ¹ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(m - 1=\varphi(m)\) ä¸ºå…¶é˜¶ï¼Œæ•…ä¸€å®šæœ‰ \(m - 1\mid k\dfrac{m-1}{2}\)ï¼Œæ•… \(k\) ä¸ºå¶æ•°ã€‚è¿™å°±æ˜¯è¯´ \((g^{k/2})^2\equiv a\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(a\) ä¸ºäºŒæ¬¡å‰©ä½™ã€‚

Cipolla ç®—æ³•

ç”±äºæ¨¡ \(m\) æ„ä¹‰ä¸‹çš„äºŒæ¬¡å‰©ä½™æœ‰ \(\dfrac{m - 1}{2}\) ä¸ªï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æœŸæœ›ä¸¤æ¬¡å°±èƒ½æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ª \(b\) æ»¡è¶³ \(b^2 - a\) ä¸ºéäºŒæ¬¡å‰©ä½™ã€‚

ç„¶åä¾¿æ˜¯ Cipolla çš„æ ¸å¿ƒæ€æƒ³ï¼šæ‰©åŸŸï¼Œäººä¸ºå®šä¹‰ \(i^2 = b^2 - a\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ‰€æœ‰çš„æ•°éƒ½å¯ä»¥è¢«è¡¨è¾¾ä¸º \(A + Bi\) çš„å½¢å¼ï¼Œåˆ™ \(a \equiv (b + i)^{m + 1}\pmod m\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(x \equiv (a + i)^{\frac{m - 1}{2}}\)ã€‚

int t, n, p, w;

struct cmplx {
    int x, y;
};

il cmplx mul(cmplx a, cmplx b, int p) {
    cmplx ans = {0, 0};
    ans.x = ((1ll * a.x * b.x % p + 1ll * a.y * b.y % p * w % p) + p) % p;
    ans.y = ((1ll * a.x * b.y % p + 1ll * a.y * b.x % p) + p) % p;
    return ans;
}

int qPow(int a, int b, int p) {
    int ret = 1;
    for (; b; b >>= 1, a = 1ll * a * a % p)
        if (b & 1) ret = 1ll * ret * a % p;
    return ret;
}

int qPow(cmplx a, int b, int p) {
    cmplx ans = {1, 0};
    for (; b; b >>= 1, a = mul(a, a, p))
        if (b & 1) ans = mul(ans, a, p);
    return ans.x % p;
}

int cipolla(int n, int p) {
    n %= p;
    if (p == 2) return n;
    if (qPow(n, (p - 1) / 2, p) == p - 1) return -1;
    int a;
    while (1) {
        a = rand() % p;
        w = ((1ll * a * a % p - n) % p + p) % p;
        if (qPow(w, (p - 1) / 2, p) == p - 1) break;
    }
    cmplx x = {a, 1};
    return qPow(x, (p + 1) / 2, p);
}

int main() {
    srand(time(0));
    read(t);
    while (t--) {
        read(n), read(p);
        if (!n) {
            putchar('0'), putchar('\n');
            continue;
        }
        int ans1 = cipolla(n, p), ans2 = p - ans1;
        if (ans1 == -1) {
            puts("Hola!");
            continue;
        }
        else print(min(ans1, ans2)), putchar(' '), print(max(ans1, ans2));
        putchar('\n');
    }
    return output(), 0;
}

item.description:
è«æ¯”ä¹Œæ–¯åæ¼”ç›¸å…³

è­¦å‘Šï¼šæœ¬èŠ‚å¯¹æ¨å¼å­èƒ½åŠ›è¦æ±‚è¾ƒé«˜ã€‚

é¦–å…ˆ \(O(n)\) åšæ³•è‚¯å®šæ˜¯å¯„äº†çš„ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘ä¼˜åŒ–ã€‚æ‰“ä¸ªè¡¨å‘ç°å¾ˆå¤šæ®µ \(\lfloor n / i\rfloor\) çš„å€¼éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä¸‹é¢è¯´æ˜è¿™äº›ä¸åŒçš„å€¼åªæœ‰ \(O(\sqrt n)\) ç§ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆç°åœ¨è€ƒè™‘ç»™å®š \(l\)ï¼Œè¦æ±‚ç¡®å®šå‡ºåˆ†å—å³ç«¯ç‚¹ \(r\) æ»¡è¶³ \(\forall i\in[l,r]\) éƒ½æœ‰ \(\lfloor n / i\rfloor = \lfloor n / l\rfloor\)ï¼Œä¸” \(r\) æœ€å¤§ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±æ˜¯å¦‚ä¸‹é™åˆ¶æ¡ä»¶ï¼š \[ \begin{cases} k = \lfloor n / l\rfloor\\ r = \displaystyle\max_{ik\le n}\{i\} \end{cases} \] é‚£ä¹ˆå°±æœ‰ \(\displaystyle r = \left\lfloor\frac nk\right\rfloor = \left\lfloor\frac{n}{\left\lfloor\frac n l\right\rfloor}\right\rfloor\)ã€‚

ll calc(ll n) {
    ll ans = 0;
    for (ll l = 1, r; l <= n; l = r + 1) {
        r = n / (n / l);
        ans += (r - l + 1) * (n / l);
    }
    return ans;
}

ä¾‹é¢˜ï¼šP3935 Calculating

è‹¥ \(x\) åˆ†è§£è´¨å› æ•°ç»“æœä¸º \(x=p_1^{k_1}p_2^{k_2}\cdots p_n^{k_n}\)ï¼Œä»¤\(f(x)=(k_1+1)(k_2+1)\cdots (k_n+1)\)ï¼Œæ±‚ \(\sum_{i=l}^rf(i)\) å¯¹ \(998\,244\,353\) å–æ¨¡çš„ç»“æœã€‚\(1\le l\le 10^{14}\)ï¼Œ\(1\le r\le 1.6\times 10^{14}\)ï¼Œ\(r-l>10^{14}\)ã€‚

æ³¨æ„åˆ° \(k\bmod i\) å¯ä»¥æ‹†æˆ \(k - i\lfloor k / i\rfloor\)ï¼Œç„¶åæ•´ä¸ªå¼å­å¯ä»¥åŒ–ä¸º \[ kn - \sum_{i=1}^ni\left\lfloor \frac k i\right\rfloor \] æ¯ä¸€å—å†…ç»Ÿè®¡å¹³å‡å€¼å•¥çš„å³å¯ã€‚

å…¶ä»–å˜å½¢

ä½¿ç”¨ç±»ä¼¼çš„åˆ†ææ–¹æ³•å¯ä»¥å¤„ç†æ›´å¤šç±»ä¼¼çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚

ä¾‹é¢˜ P2260 [æ¸…åé›†è®­2012]æ¨¡ç§¯å’Œ \[ \sum_{1\le i\le n} \sum_{1\le j\le m,i\ne j} (n \bmod i) \times (m \bmod j)\bmod19940417 \] \(1\le n,m\le 10^9\)ã€‚

äºŒç»´æ•´é™¤åˆ†å—ã€‚ä¸å¦¨å‡è®¾ \(n\le m\)ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆå®¹æ–¥ä¸€æ³¢å°† \(i\ne j\) å»æ‰ï¼š \[ \sum_{i=1}^n(n\bmod i)\sum_{j=1}^m(m\bmod j) - \sum_{i=1}^n(n\bmod i)(m\bmod i) \] ç„¶åç”¨ä¸Šé¢çš„åŒ–ç®€æ–¹æ³•æŠŠå–æ¨¡æ‹†å¼€ï¼š \[ \left(n^2 - \sum_{i=1}^ni\left\lfloor\frac ni\right\rfloor \right)\times\left(m^2 - \sum_{i=1}^mi\left\lfloor\frac mi\right\rfloor \right) - \sum_{i=1}^n\left(n - i\left\lfloor \frac n i \right\rfloor\right)\left(m - i\left\lfloor \frac m i \right\rfloor\right) \] å‰é¢çš„ä¸¤å¤§å¨æ˜¯ä¸€èˆ¬é€šè¿‡æ•´é™¤åˆ†å—ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬çœ‹åé¢ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼š \[ \begin{aligned} &\sum_{i=1}^n\left(n - i\left\lfloor \frac n i \right\rfloor\right)\left(m - i\left\lfloor \frac m i \right\rfloor\right)\\ =&\sum_{i=1}^n\left(nm - ni\left\lfloor \frac n i \right\rfloor - mi\left\lfloor \frac m i \right\rfloor + i^2\left\lfloor \frac n i \right\rfloor\left\lfloor \frac m i \right\rfloor\right)\\ =&n^2m - n\sum_{i=1}^n\left\lfloor \frac n i \right\rfloor - m\sum_{i=1}^n\left\lfloor \frac m i \right\rfloor + \sum_{i=1}^ni^2\left\lfloor \frac n i \right\rfloor\left\lfloor \frac m i \right\rfloor \end{aligned} \] å‰ä¸‰é¡¹æ¯”è¾ƒå¥½åšï¼Œä¸»è¦é—®é¢˜æ˜¯ç¬¬å››é¡¹ã€‚å®é™…ä¸Šä½ ä¼šå‘ç°ç”±äº \(\lfloor n /i\rfloor\) å’Œ \(\lfloor m / i\rfloor\) éƒ½æˆå—çŠ¶ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è½¬æŠ˜ç‚¹ä¸€å…±ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ \(O(\sqrt n)\) çš„ï¼Œä¸€æ ·å¯ä»¥æ•´é™¤åˆ†å—ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡å¯¹ \(\lfloor n / \lfloor n / l\rfloor\rfloor\) å’Œ \(\lfloor m / \lfloor m / l\rfloor\rfloor\) å–ä¸ª \(\min\) å³å¯ã€‚è€Œå¯¹äº \(\sum i^2\) æœ‰å…¬å¼åœ¨å¼€å¤´ç»™å‡ºï¼Œåœ¨æ­¤ä¸è¡¨ã€‚

#include <cstdio>
#define il inline

typedef long long ll;

inline ll min(ll a, ll b){return a < b ? a : b;}

const ll mod = 19940417, inv2 = 9970209, inv6 = 3323403;

ll n, m, ans;

ll calc(ll n, ll k) {
    ll ret = 0;
    n = min(n, k);
    for (ll l = 1, r = 1; l <= n; l = r + 1) {
        r = min(n, k / (k / l));
        ret += ((r - l + 1) * (k / l * l) % mod + (r - l + 1) * (r - l) % mod * (k / l) % mod * inv2 % mod) % mod;
        ret %= mod;
    }
    return ret;
}

il ll summod(ll n) {
    return (n * n % mod - calc(n, n) + mod) % mod;
}

il ll sum(ll n) {
    return n * (n + 1) % mod * (2 * n + 1) % mod * inv6 % mod;
}

ll calc2(ll n, ll m) {
    ll top = min(n, m);
    ll ret = n * m % mod * top % mod;
    ret -= m * calc(top, n);
    ret = (ret + mod) % mod;
    ret -= n * calc(top, m);
    ret = (ret + mod) % mod;
    for (ll l = 1, r; l <= top; l = r + 1) {
        r = min(min(top, n / (n / l)), m / (m / l));//åŒæ—¶å–minï¼Œæ³¨æ„ä¸Šç•Œé—®é¢˜
        ll sqri = sum(r) - sum(l - 1);
        ret = (ret + sqri * (n / l) % mod * (m / l) % mod) % mod;
    }
    return ret;
}

int main() {
    scanf("%lld %lld", &n, &m);
    ans = summod(n) * summod(m) % mod;
    ans = (ans - calc2(n, m) + mod) % mod;
    printf("%lld\n", ans);
    return 0;
}

ä¸è€ƒè™‘ \(\gcd\) çš„é™åˆ¶ï¼Œå‘ç°å…¶ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªèƒŒåŒ…ã€‚ä»¤ \(f_{i, j}\) ä¸ºå‰ \(i\) ä¸ªç‰©å“ï¼ŒèƒŒåŒ…å®¹é‡ä¸º \(j\) çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ï¼Œåˆ™æœ‰è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼š \[ f_{i, j} = \sum_{k = l_i}^{r_i}f_{i - 1, j - k} \] è¿™æ ·ç›´æ¥å»åšæ˜¯ \(O(nm^2)\) çš„ï¼Œå‘ç°è½¬ç§»å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å‰ç¼€å’Œä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œå…·ä½“è®¾ \(s_{i, j}\) è¡¨ç¤º \[ s_{i, j} = \sum_{k = 0}^jf_{i, k} \] ç„¶åå°±æœ‰äº†è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹ \[ f_{i, j} = s_{i - 1, j - l_i} - s_{i - 1, j - r_i - 1} \] èƒŒåŒ…éƒ¨åˆ†çš„å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º \(O(nm)\)ã€‚æ¥ä¸‹æ¥è€ƒè™‘ \(\gcd\) çš„é™åˆ¶ï¼Œå¯¹äºè¿™ç§å¤šä¸ªçš„æƒ…å†µä¸€æ ·å¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘åæ¼”ï¼š \[ \begin{aligned} &\sum_{a_1=l_1}^{r_1}\sum_{a_2=l_2}^{r_2}\cdots\sum_{a_n=l_n}^{r_n}[\gcd(a_1,\cdots,a_n)=1]\left[\sum_{i = 1}^na_i\le m\right]\\ =&\sum_{a_1=l_1}^{r_1}\sum_{a_2=l_2}^{r_2}\cdots\sum_{a_n=l_n}^{r_n}\left[\sum_{i = 1}^na_i\le m\right]\sum_{d \mid \gcd(a_1,\cdots,a_n)}\mu(d)\\ =&\sum_{a_1=l_1}^{r_1}\sum_{a_2=l_2}^{r_2}\cdots\sum_{a_n=l_n}^{r_n}\left[\sum_{i = 1}^na_i\le m\right]\sum_{d\mid a_1,\cdots,d \mid a_n}\mu(d)\\ =&\sum_{d=1}^m\mu(d)\sum_{a_1=\lceil\frac{l_1}{d}\rceil}^{\lfloor\frac{r_1}{d}\rfloor}\sum_{a_2=\lceil\frac{l_2}{d}\rceil}^{\lfloor\frac{r_2}{d}\rfloor}\cdots\sum_{a_n=\lceil\frac{l_n}{d}\rceil}^{\lfloor\frac{r_n}{d}\rfloor}\left[\sum_{i = 1}^na_i\le \left\lfloor\frac m d\right\rfloor\right] \end{aligned} \] ç„¶åæšä¸¾ \(d\in[1, m]\)ï¼Œå‘ç°å…¶å°±æ˜¯ä¸ªå­é—®é¢˜ï¼Œ\(O(nm\log m)\) è§£å†³ã€‚å¯¹äº \(\mu(d) = 0\) çš„æƒ…å†µè·³è¿‡è¿˜å¯ä»¥åŠ é€Ÿã€‚

å®šä¹‰ \(f_m(n)\) ä¸ºæ‰€æœ‰å°äº \(n\) ä¸”ä¸ \(n\) äº’ç´ çš„æ­£æ•´æ•°çš„ \(m\) æ¬¡æ–¹ä¹‹å’Œã€‚ç»™å®š \(m\) çš„å€¼å’Œ \(n\) çš„è´¨å› æ•°åˆ†è§£å¼ï¼Œæ±‚ \(f_m(n)\bmod 10^9 + 7\) çš„å€¼ã€‚

é€šè¿‡â€œ\(x\) æ˜¯åˆæ•°ï¼Œåˆ™ \(x\) çš„å€æ•°ä¹Ÿæ˜¯åˆæ•°â€æ¥å‡å°‘æ ‡è®°æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œå³åªæ ‡è®°æ‰€æœ‰ç´ æ•°çš„å€æ•°ã€‚

void Eratosthenes() {
    isp[0] = isp[1] = 1;
    for (int i = 2; i <= N; ++i) {
        if (!isp[i]) {
            prime[++totp] = i;
            if (1ll * i * i <= N)
                for (int j = i * i; j <= N; j += i)
                    isp[j] = 1;
        }
    }
    return;
}

é¦–å…ˆå†æ¬¡å¼ºè°ƒï¼šæ¯ä¸ªåˆæ•° \(n\) ä¼šè¢«å…¶æœ€å°è´¨å› å­ \(p\) ç­›å»ï¼Œä¸‹é¢ä»¤ \(n' = n / p\)ã€‚

  • å¯¹äº \(p\not\mid n'\) çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œ\(n'\) å’Œ \(p\) å¿…ç„¶äº’è´¨ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶æœ‰ \(\varphi(n) = \varphi(n')\times \varphi(p) = (p - 1)\varphi(n')\)ã€‚

  • å¦åˆ™å¯¹äº \(p\mid n'\) çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œ\(n'\) å¿…ç„¶åŒ…å« \(n\) çš„æ‰€æœ‰è´¨å› å­ï¼Œæ‹†å¼€ \(\varphi(n)\) çš„è¡¨è¾¾å¼æœ‰ \[ \begin{aligned} \varphi(n) &= n\times \prod \frac{p_i - 1}{p_i}\\ &= p\times n'\times \prod\frac{p_i - 1}{p_i}\\ &= p\times \varphi(n') \end{aligned} \]

é‚£ä¹ˆäº‹æƒ…å°±å˜å¾—æ˜æœ—äº†ï¼Œå¯¹äºè´¨æ•°ï¼Œ\(\varphi(n) = n - 1\)ï¼Œå¯¹äºåˆæ•°ï¼Œåœ¨ç­›çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­æŒ‰ç…§ä¸Šé¢çš„å…¬å¼æ±‚å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚æ³¨æ„è¾¹ç•Œ \(\varphi(1) = 1\)ã€‚

void sieve() {
    phi[1] = 1;
    for (int i = 2; i <= maxn; ++i) {
        if (!vis[i]) {
            phi[i] = i - 1;
            p[++tot] = i;
        }
        for (int j = 1; j <= tot && i * p[j] <= maxn; ++j) {
            vis[i * p[j]] = 1;
            if (i % p[j] == 0) {
                phi[i * p[j]] = p[j] * phi[i];
                break;
            }
            phi[i * p[j]] = (p[j] - 1) * phi[i];
        }
    }
    return;
}

è€Œäºè«æ¯”ä¹Œæ–¯å‡½æ•°ï¼Œåˆ™ç›¸å¯¹æ›´å¥½è€ƒè™‘ã€‚è¿˜æ˜¯ä»¤ \(n' = n / p\)ï¼Œ\(p\) ä¸º \(n\) çš„æœ€å°è´¨å› å­ã€‚

å¯¹äºè´¨æ•°ï¼Œ\(\mu(n) = -1\)ï¼Œå¯¹äºåˆæ•°ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§ä¸Šé¢çš„æ–¹å¼åˆ†ç±»è®¨è®ºï¼š

  • \(p\not\mid n'\)ï¼Œåˆ™ \(n'\) ä¸ \(p\) ä¸€å®šäº’è´¨ï¼Œ\(\mu(n) = -\mu(n')\)ã€‚

è¿˜æ˜¯æ³¨æ„è¾¹ç•Œï¼Œ\(\mu(1) = 1\)ï¼Œè®°ä¸ä½çš„è¯è€ƒè™‘ç§¯æ€§å‡½æ•°çš„æ€§è´¨ã€‚

void sieve() {
    mu[1] = 1;
    for (int i = 2; i <= N; ++i) {
        if (!vis[i]) {
            mu[i] = -1;
            prime[++tot] = i;
        }
        for (int j = 1; j <= tot && i * prime[j] <= N; ++j) {
            vis[i * prime[j]] = 1;
            if (i % prime[j]) mu[i * prime[j]] = -mu[i];
            else break;
        }
    }
    return;
}

ç„¶åå°† \(g(1)S(n)\) ç§»é¡¹ä¸€ä¸‹å°±å¾—åˆ°äº†æœæ•™ç­›çš„æ ¸å¿ƒå¼å­ï¼š \[ g(1)S(n) = \sum_{i=1}^n(f*g)(i) - \sum_{d=2}^ng(d)S\left(\left\lfloor\dfrac nd\right\rfloor\right) \] å¦‚æœèƒ½å¿«é€Ÿç®—å‡º \((f*g)(n)\) å’Œ \(g(n)\) çš„å‰ç¼€å’Œçš„è¯ï¼Œå°±æ„å‘³ç€ä¸Šé¢çš„å¼å­å¯ä»¥å¿«é€Ÿé€’å½’è®¡ç®—ã€‚è§ä¸‹é¢ä¼ªä»£ç ï¼š

ll getSum(int n) {

    ll ret = f_g_sum(n); // æ±‚ (f*g)(i) çš„å‰ç¼€å’Œ

}

å³å¥‡æ•°ä½ç½®ä¸Šçš„å’Œã€‚è®¾å…¶ä¸º \(T(n)\)ï¼Œ\(\mu\) çš„å‰ç¼€å’Œä¸º \(S(n)\)ã€‚è€ƒè™‘ç”¨ \(S(n)\) å‡å»å¶æ•°ä½ç½®ä¸Š \(\mu\) çš„å’Œï¼Œè‡³äºå¶æ•°ä½ç½®ä¸Š \(\mu\) çš„å’Œï¼Œè€ƒè™‘è‹¥å…¶åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª \(2\) å› å­ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆ \(/2\) ä¹‹åå…¶å¿…ç„¶æ˜¯å¥‡æ•°ï¼Œè€Œè‹¥æœ‰å¤šä¸ª \(2\) çš„å› å­çš„è¯ï¼Œæ˜¾ç„¶æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä¸ç®¡ï¼Œäºæ˜¯è¿™éƒ¨åˆ†è´¡çŒ®å°±æ˜¯ \(-T(\lfloor n / 2\rfloor)\)ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥ \[ T(n) = S(n) + T(\lfloor n / 2\rfloor) \]

ç”±äº \(\sigma_k = \boldsymbol 1 * \mathrm{id}_k\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(\sigma_k * \mu = \mathrm{id}_k\)ï¼Œç„¶åï¼š \[ S(n) = \sum_{i=1}^n\mathrm{id}_k(i) - \sum_{d=2}^n\mu(d)S\left(\left\lfloor\dfrac nd\right\rfloor\right) \] é¡ºä¾¿éœ€è¦ç­›å‡º \(\mu\)ã€‚

æ¨¡å‹ \(4\)ï¼š\(\mu\cdot \mathrm{id}_k\) å’Œ \(\varphi\cdot \mathrm{id}_k\)ã€‚ç‚¹ä¹˜å‹ã€‚

æ„é€  \(g\) çš„æ—¶å€™è®© \(g\) æ¥ä¸€ä¸ª \(\mathrm{id}_k\) å·æ‰å³å¯ã€‚å…·ä½“åœ°ï¼š \[ \begin{aligned} (\mu\cdot \mathrm{id}_k)* \mathrm{id}_k &= \sum_{d\mid n}\mu(d)d^k\left(\frac nd\right)^k\\ &= n^k\sum_{d\mid n}\mu(d)\\ &= \varepsilon \end{aligned} \] è‡³äºæ¬§æ‹‰ï¼Œåˆ™æœ‰ \[ \begin{aligned} (\varphi \cdot \mathrm{id}_k) * \mathrm{id}_k &= \sum_{d\mid n}\varphi(d)d^k\left(\frac nd\right)^k\\ &= n^k\sum_{d\mid n}\varphi(d)\\ &= \mathrm{id}^{k + 1} \end{aligned} \] ç„¶åæœæ•™ç­›çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ç•¥ã€‚

noteï¼šå¸¸è§çš„ \(\mathrm{id}_k\) å‰ç¼€å’Œï¼š

  • \(\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^n\mathrm{id}(i) = \frac{n(n+1)}{2}\)ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªåº”è¯¥æ˜¯è¾ƒå¸¸è§„çš„ç­‰å·®æ•°åˆ—æ±‚å’Œã€‚
  • \(\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^n\mathrm{id}_2(i) = \frac{n(n+1)(2n+1)}{6}\)ï¼Œè¯æ˜å¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘æ•°å½’ã€‚
  • \(\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^n\mathrm{id}_3(i) = \left[\frac{n(n+1)}{2}\right]^2\)ï¼Œè¯æ˜åŒæ ·è€ƒè™‘æ•°å½’ã€‚

æ­¤å¤–ï¼Œç”±äº \((\sum \mathrm{id}_k)(n)\) æ˜¯å…³äº \(n\) çš„ \(k+ 1\) æ¬¡å¤šé¡¹å¼ï¼ˆç»å…¸ç»“è®ºï¼‰ï¼Œæ•…å½“ \(k\) ä¸å¤§æ—¶å¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘å°†ç³»æ•°æ’å‡ºæ¥ç„¶å \(O(k)\) å•æ¬¡æ±‚å€¼ã€‚

ä¸Šé¢çš„å‡ ä¸ªå¼å­å»ºè®®ç‰¢è®°ï¼Œå¯ä»¥çœå»è‡ªå·±æ¨çš„éº»çƒ¦ã€‚

æ¨¡å‹ \(6\)ï¼šç­› \(\mu^2\)ã€‚

åº”è¯¥æ˜¯æ¯”è¾ƒç¥ä»™çš„æ„é€  \(g\) å‡½æ•°äº†ã€‚

æ­¤å¤„å– \(g(n) = [n = k^2, k\in \mathbb{N}_+]\)ã€‚è™½ç„¶ \(g\) çš„å‰ç¼€å’Œçœ‹ä¼¼ä¸å¥½æ±‚ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬å¯¹äºè¿™ç§çœŸå€¼è¡¨è¾¾å¼çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ”¹å˜æšä¸¾çš„ç­–ç•¥ä½¿å¾—å…¶æ’æˆç«‹ï¼Œå˜ä¸ºå¸¸æ•°å‡½æ•°ã€‚

\((f*g)(n) = \displaystyle\sum_{d\mid n}g(d)f(n / d)\)ï¼Œè§‚å¯Ÿå‘ç° \(g(d)f(n / d)\) ä»…åœ¨ \(d\) å–åˆ° \(n\) çš„æœ€å¤§å¹³æ–¹å› å­æ—¶ä¸º \(1\)ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¸º \(0\)ã€‚å› ä¸ºè‹¥ \(d\) ä¸ä¸ºæœ€å¤§å¹³æ–¹å› å­ï¼Œåˆ™ \(n / d\) è‚¯å®šå«å¹³æ–¹å› å­ï¼Œ\(\mu^2(n / d) = 0\)ã€‚å¦åˆ™ \(n / d\) ä¸€å®šä¸å«å¹³æ–¹å› å­ï¼Œ\(f(n / d) = g(d) = 1\)ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥ \(f*g = \boldsymbol 1\)ã€‚

å¥—å›æœæ•™ç­›çš„å¼å­ï¼š \[ \begin{aligned} S(n) &= \sum_{i=1}^n (f*g)(i) - \sum_{d=2}^ng(d)S\left(\left\lfloor\frac nd\right\rfloor \right)\\ &= n - \sum_{d=2}^{\lfloor \sqrt n\rfloor} S\left(\left\lfloor\frac{n}{d^2}\right\rfloor \right) \end{aligned} \] æ²¡æ³•æ•´é™¤åˆ†å—ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯èƒ½å¤æ‚åº¦å±ã€‚

ä½†å…¶å®è¿˜æœ‰å¦ä¸€ç§æ–¹æ³•ï¼šæˆ‘ä»¬è€ƒè™‘å®¹æ–¥ã€‚\(S(n)\) å¯ä»¥çœ‹ä½œ æ€»æ•° - ä¸€ä¸ªå¹³æ–¹æ•°çš„å€æ•° + ä¸¤ä¸ªå¹³æ–¹æ•°çš„å€æ•° - â€¦..ï¼Œå‘ç°å®¹æ–¥ç³»æ•°å°±æ˜¯ \(\mu\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(S(n) = \displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{\lfloor \sqrt n\rfloor}\mu(i)\lfloor n / i^2\rfloor\)ã€‚

å¦æœ‰å°ç»“è®º \(\mu^2(n) = \displaystyle\sum_{d^2\mid n}\mu(d)\)ã€‚

åº”ç”¨

ä¾‹é¢˜ \(1\)ï¼šP4213 ã€æ¨¡æ¿ã€‘æœæ•™ç­›ï¼ˆSumï¼‰

\(T\le 10\) ç»„è¯¢é—®ï¼Œä¸€æ¬¡è¯¢é—®æŸ¥è¯¢ \(\varphi\) å’Œ \(\mu\) çš„å‰ç¼€å’Œï¼Œ\(n< 2^{31}\)ã€‚

ä¸»è¦çœ‹ä¸‹ä»£ç æ€ä¹ˆå†™çš„ã€‚

using ll = unsigned long long;
const int maxn = 1e7 + 15;
std::unordered_map<ll, ll> Mu, Phi;
ll mu[maxn], phi[maxn];
int vis[maxn], p[maxn], tot;

void init() {// çº¿æ€§ç­› mu å’Œ phi åœ¨ 1e7 å¤„å‰ç¼€å’Œçš„è¿‡ç¨‹çœç•¥}

ll getSumPhi(ll n) {
    if (n <= maxn)
        return phi[n];
    if (Phi[n])
        return Phi[n];
    ll ans = (ll)(n + 1ll) * (ll)n / 2ll; // id çš„å‰ç¼€å’Œ
    for (ll l = 2, r; l <= n; l = r + 1) {
        r = n / (n / l);
        ans -= (r - l + 1LL) * getSumPhi(n / l);
    }
    return Phi[n] = ans; // è®°å¿†åŒ–
}

ll getSumMu(ll n) {
    if (n <= maxn)
        return mu[n];
    if (Mu[n])
        return Mu[n];
    ll ans = 1; // epsilon çš„å‰ç¼€å’Œå°±æ˜¯ 1
    for (ll l = 2, r; l <= n; l = r + 1) {
        r = n / (n / l);
        ans -= (r - l + 1LL) * getSumMu(n / l);
    }
    return Mu[n] = ans; // è®°å¿†åŒ–
}

ABC162E - Sum of gcd of Tuples (Hard) çš„åŠ å¼ºï¼šç»™å®š \(1\le N, K\le 10^{11}\)ï¼Œæ±‚ \[ \sum_{a_1 = 1}^K\sum_{a_2 = 1}^K\cdots\sum_{a_N = 1}^K\gcd_{i = 1}^N\{a_i\}\bmod {10^9 + 7} \] ç­”æ¡ˆå¯¹ \(2^{64}\) å–æ¨¡ã€‚

å…ˆè€ƒè™‘åæ¼”ï¼š \[ \begin{aligned} &\sum_{a_1 = 1}^K\sum_{a_2 = 1}^K\cdots\sum_{a_N = 1}^K\gcd_{i = 1}^N\{a_i\}\\ =&\sum_{a_1 = 1}^K\cdots\sum_{a_N = 1}^K\sum_{d\mid a_1,\cdots d\mid a_N}\varphi(d)\\ =&\sum_{d = 1}^K\varphi(d)\sum_{a_1 = 1}^K\cdots\sum_{a_N = 1}^K[d\mid \gcd\{a_i\}]\\ =&\sum_{d = 1}^K\varphi(d)\left\lfloor\frac Kd\right\rfloor^N \end{aligned} \] ç„¶åå°±å¯ä»¥æ•´é™¤åˆ†å— + æœæ•™ç­›äº†ï¼Œæ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º \(O(n^{2/3})\)ã€‚

é¦–å…ˆæ˜¾ç„¶å…ˆæ¬§æ‹‰åæ¼”ï¼š \[ \begin{aligned} \sum_{i=1}^n\sum_{j=1}^nij\gcd(i,j) &= \sum_{i=1}^n\sum_{j=1}^nij\sum_{d\mid \gcd(i,j)}\varphi(d)\\ &= \sum_{d=1}^n\varphi(d)\sum_{i=1}^n[d\mid i]i\sum_{j=1}^n[d\mid j]j\\ &= \sum_{d=1}^n\varphi(d)d^2 \left( \frac{(1 + \lfloor n / d\rfloor)\lfloor n / d\rfloor}{2}\right)^2 \end{aligned} \] å‘ç°åé¢é‚£å¨å¼å­å¯ä»¥æ•´é™¤åˆ†å—ï¼Œè€Œ \(\varphi(d)d^2\) å°±æ˜¯ä¸Šé¢è®²çš„ \(\varphi \cdot \mathrm{id}_k\) ç±»å‹ï¼Œç›´æ¥åšå³å¯ã€‚

B

Description

ç»™å®šä¸€ \(n\) ä¸ªç‚¹æ„æˆçš„ç½‘æ ¼çŠ¶å››è¿é€šå—ï¼Œèµ·åˆå…¨æ˜¯ç™½è‰²ï¼Œè¦æ±‚æ¶‚é»‘æœ€å°‘æ•°é‡çš„ç‚¹ï¼Œç„¶åèƒ½é€šè¿‡ä¸‹é¢çš„æ“ä½œä½¿å¾—æ‰€æœ‰ç‚¹è¢«æŸ“é»‘ã€‚

  • è‹¥ç”°å­—æ ¼ä¸­æœ‰ä¸‰ä¸ªé»‘è‰²ï¼Œåˆ™ç¬¬å››ä¸ªä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å˜æˆé»‘è‰²ã€‚

å¯èƒ½è¦æ„é€ æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚

Solution

ç­”æ¡ˆä¸º \(C / 2 + 1\)ï¼Œæ–¹æ¡ˆä¸éš¾æ„é€ ã€‚

struct Point {
    int x, y, id;
    il bool operator<(const Point &b) const {return x == b.x ? y < b.y : x < b.x;}
} p[maxn];

std::map<std::pair<int, int>, int> exist;
#define mp(x, y) std::make_pair(x, y)

int main() {
    int type;
    read(n), read(type);
    FOR(i, 1, n) read(p[i].x), read(p[i].y), exist[mp(p[i].x, p[i].y)] = 1, p[i].id = i;
    std::sort(p + 1, p + n + 1);
    std::vector<int> ans;
    
    FOR(i, 1, n) {
        if (exist[mp(p[i].x + 1, p[i].y)] && exist[mp(p[i].x + 1, p[i].y + 1)] && exist[mp(p[i].x, p[i].y + 1)]);
        else ans.push_back(p[i].id);
    }
    
    print(ans.size()), putchar('\n');
    if (type) for (auto i : ans) print(i), putchar(' ');
    return output(), 0;
}

item.title: è«å/æœæ•™ç­›åšé¢˜è®°å½•
item.description:
[TOC]

æ´›è°· P3455 [POI2007]ZAP-Queries

Description

æ±‚ï¼š \[ \sum_{i = 1}^a\sum_{j = 1}^b[\gcd(i,j) = d] \] ### Solution

è«æ¯”ä¹Œæ–¯åæ¼”æ—¶ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬è¦å°†å« \(\gcd\) çš„å¼å­åŒ–ä¸º \(\gcd(i,j) = 1\) çš„å½¢å¼æ‰å¥½åæ¼”ã€‚å› æ­¤è€ƒè™‘è®¾ \(a' = a/d\)ï¼Œ\(b' = b/d\)ï¼ŒåŸå¼åŒ–ä¸º \[ \sum_{i = 1}^{a'}\sum_{j = 1}^{b'}[\gcd(i,j) = 1] \] ç„¶åå°±å¯ä»¥æ„‰å¿«çš„åæ¼”äº†ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬çŸ¥é“ \[ \mu * 1 = \varepsilon \] æ‰€ä»¥ \[ \varepsilon(n) = \sum_{d\mid n}\mu(d) \] ç¨å¾®å˜ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼š \[ \varepsilon(\gcd(i,j)) = \sum_{d\mid \gcd(i,j)}\mu(d) \] æ‰€ä»¥åŸå¼åŒ–ä¸º \[ \sum_{i = 1}^{a'}\sum_{j = 1}^{b'}\sum_{d\mid \gcd(i,j)}\mu(d) \] è€ƒè™‘å†™æˆæšä¸¾ \(d\) çš„å½¢å¼ï¼š \[ \begin{aligned} &\sum_{i = 1}^{a'}\sum_{j = 1}^{b'}\sum_{d\mid \gcd(i,j)}\mu(d)\\ =&\sum_{i = 1}^{a'}\sum_{j = 1}^{b'}\sum_{d = 1}^{\min(a',b')}[d\mid\gcd(i,j)]\mu(d)\\ =&\sum_{d=1}^{\min(a',b')}\mu(d)\sum_{i = 1}^{a'}\sum_{j = 1}^{b'}[d\mid\gcd(i,j)] \end{aligned} \] è€ƒè™‘åˆ°è‹¥è¦ä½¿ \(d\mid \gcd(i,j)\)ï¼Œ\(i\) å’Œ \(j\) å¿…é¡»åŒä¸º \(d\) çš„å€æ•°ï¼Œæ ¹æ®ä¹˜æ³•åŸç†ï¼ŒåŸå¼å¯ä»¥åŒ–ä¸º \[ \sum_{d=1}^{\min(a',b')}\mu(d)\left\lfloor\frac{a'}{d}\right\rfloor\left\lfloor\frac{b'}{d}\right\rfloor \] é¢„å¤„ç†å‡º \(\mu\) çš„å‰ç¼€å’Œï¼Œå†å¥—ä¸€ä¸ªæ•´é™¤åˆ†å—å³å¯ã€‚

#include <cstdio>
#include <cctype>
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = a; i <= b; ++i)

const int maxn = 5e4 + 7;

inline int read()
{
    char c = getchar();
    int s = 0;
    while (!isdigit(c))
        c = getchar();
    while (isdigit(c))
        s = 10 * s + c - '0', c = getchar();
    return s;
}

int mu[maxn], prime[maxn], tot, vis[maxn];

void getmu()
{
    mu[1] = 1;
    for (int i = 2; i <= maxn - 5; ++i)
    {
        if (!vis[i])
        {
            mu[i] = -1;
            prime[++tot] = i;
        }
        for (int j = 1; j <= tot && i * prime[j] <= maxn - 5; ++j)
        {
            vis[i * prime[j]] = 1;
            if (i % prime[j] == 0)
            {
                mu[i * prime[j]] = 0;
                break;
            }
            else
                mu[i * prime[j]] = -mu[i];
        }
    }
    FOR(i, 1, maxn - 5)
        mu[i] += mu[i - 1];
    return;
}

inline int min(int a, int b) {return a < b ? a : b;}

int main()
{
    getmu();
    int T = read();
    while (T--)
    {
        int a = read(), b = read(), d = read();
        a /= d, b /= d;
        int top = min(a, b), ans = 0;
        for (int l = 1, r = 0; l <= top && r <= top; l = r + 1)
        {
            r = min(top, min(a / (a / l), b / (b / l)));
            ans += (a / l) * (b / l) * (mu[r] - mu[l - 1]);
        }
        printf("%d\n", ans);
    }
    return 0;
}

æ´›è°· P2522 [HAOI2011]Problem b ä¸æ­¤é¢˜ç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œåªä¸è¿‡éœ€è¦å¥—ä¸€ä¸ªå®¹æ–¥ã€‚

Summary

å°†å«æœ‰ gcd çš„å¼å­åŒ–ä¸º \([\gcd(i,j) = 1]\)ï¼Œç„¶åå°±å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ \(\varepsilon = 1 * \mu\) è¿›è¡Œåæ¼”ã€‚

æ¨å¼å­çš„æ—¶å€™éšæ—¶è®°å¾—å¯ä»¥æ”¹å˜æšä¸¾çš„é¡ºåºã€‚

æ´›è°· P2257 YYçš„GCD

Description

\[ \sum_{i = 1}^n\sum_{j = 1}^m[\gcd(i,j) \in P] \] å…¶ä¸­ \(P\) ä¸ºè´¨æ•°é›†ã€‚

Solution

ä¸å¦¨æšä¸¾è¿™ä¸ªè´¨æ•°ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š \[ \sum_{k\in P}\sum_{i = 1}^n\sum_{j = 1}^m[\gcd(i,j) = k] \] ç„¶åå°±æ˜¯åƒä¸Šé¢˜ä¸€æ ·åŒ–ç®€ï¼š \[ \begin{aligned} &\sum_{k\in P}\sum_{i = 1}^n\sum_{j = 1}^m[\gcd(i,j) = k]\\ =&\sum_{k\in P}\sum_{i = 1}^{n'}\sum_{j = 1}^{m'}[\gcd(i,j) = 1],\quad n' = \left\lfloor\frac nk \right\rfloor,m' = \left\lfloor\frac mk \right\rfloor\\ =&\sum_{k\in P}\sum_{i = 1}^{n'}\sum_{j = 1}^{m'}\sum_{d\mid \gcd(i,j)}\mu(d)\\ =&\sum_{k\in P}\sum_{d = 1}^{\min(n',m')}\mu(d)\left\lfloor\frac{n}{kd}\right\rfloor\left\lfloor\frac{m}{kd}\right\rfloor \end{aligned} \] æ­¤æ—¶è¿™ä¸ªå¼å­çœ‹ä¸Šå»å·²ç»å·®ä¸å¤šäº†ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å®é™…è¿è¡Œçš„æ—¶å€™è¿˜æ˜¯ä¼š T æ‰ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘è®¾ \(T = kd\)ï¼Œæœ‰ \[ \begin{aligned} &\sum_{k\in P}\sum_{d = 1}^{\min(n',m')}\mu(d)\left\lfloor\frac{n}{kd}\right\rfloor\left\lfloor\frac{m}{kd}\right\rfloor\\ =&\sum_{k\in P}\sum_{d= 1}^{\min(n',m')}\mu\left(\frac Tk\right)\left\lfloor\frac{n}{T}\right\rfloor\left\lfloor\frac{m}{T}\right\rfloor\\ \end{aligned} \] æ¢æˆæšä¸¾ \(T\)ï¼Œæå‰ï¼š \[ \begin{aligned} &\sum_{k\in P}\sum_{d= 1}^{\min(n',m')}\mu\left(\frac Tk\right)\left\lfloor\frac{n}{T}\right\rfloor\left\lfloor\frac{m}{T}\right\rfloor\\ =&\sum_{T = 1}^n\left\lfloor\frac{n}{T}\right\rfloor\left\lfloor\frac{m}{T}\right\rfloor\sum_{k\mid T\land k\in P}\mu\left(\frac Tk\right) \end{aligned} \] \(\displaystyle\sum_{k\mid T\land k\in P}\mu\left(\frac Tk\right)\) æ˜¯å¯ä»¥é¢„å¤„ç†çš„ï¼Œé¢„å¤„ç†ç„¶åæ•´é™¤åˆ†å—å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚å®é™…å®ç°çš„æ—¶å€™è®°å¾—å¼€ long long å¹¶å¡å¡å¸¸ï¼ˆä¸è¦å¤„å¤„ long longï¼‰

#include <cstdio>
#include <cctype>
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (register int i = a; i <= b; ++i)

const int maxn = 1e7 + 7;

inline int read()
{
    char c = getchar();
    int s = 0;
    while (!isdigit(c))
        c = getchar();
    while (isdigit(c))
        s = 10 * s + c - '0', c = getchar();
    return s;
}

inline int min(int a, int b) {return a < b ? a : b;}

typedef long long ll;

int mu[maxn], p[maxn], vis[maxn], tot;
ll sum[maxn];

void getmu()
{
    mu[1] = 1;
    FOR(i, 2, maxn - 5)
    {
        if (!vis[i])
        {
            p[++tot] = i;
            mu[i] = -1;
        }
        for (int j = 1; j <= tot && i * p[j] <= maxn - 5; ++j)
        {
            vis[i * p[j]] = 1;
            if (i % p[j] == 0)
            {
                mu[i * p[j]] = 0;
                break;
            }
            mu[i * p[j]] = -mu[i];
        }
    }
    FOR(j, 1, tot)
        for (int i = 1; i * p[j] <= maxn - 5; ++i)
            sum[i * p[j]] += mu[i];
    FOR(i, 1, maxn - 5)
        sum[i] += sum[i - 1];
    return;
}

signed main()
{
    getmu();
    int kase = read();
    while (kase--)
    {
        int n = read(), m = read();
        int top = min(n, m);
        ll ans = 0;
        for (int l = 1, r = 0; l <= top; l = r + 1)
        {
            r = min(top, min(n / (n / l), m / (m / l)));
            ans += (ll)(n / l) * (ll)(m / l) * (sum[r] - sum[l - 1]);
        }
        printf("%lld\n", ans);
    }
    return 0;
}

Summary

é€‚å½“çš„æ—¶å€™è®¾ \(T=kd\) æ˜¯å¯ä»¥åŒ–ç®€å¼å­å‡å°è¿ç®—çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦çš„ã€‚

æ´›è°· P3312 [SDOI2014]æ•°è¡¨

Description

ç»™å®š \(n,m\le 10^5,a\)ï¼Œæ±‚ \[ \sum_{i = 1}^n\sum_{j = 1}^m\sigma(\gcd(i,j))\times[\sigma(\gcd(i,j)) \le a]\bmod 2^{31} \] å…¶ä¸­ \(\sigma(x)\) è¡¨ç¤º \(x\) çš„æ­£çº¦æ•°ä¹‹å’Œã€‚

Solution

å…ˆå¿½ç•¥ \(\sigma(\gcd(i,j))\le a\) çš„æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œå¹¶å‡å®š \(n\le m\)ï¼ŒåŒ–ç®€ä¸Šé¢çš„å¼å­ï¼š \[ \begin{aligned} &\sum_{i = 1}^n\sum_{j = 1}^m\sigma(\gcd(i,j))\\ =&\sum_{i = 1}^n\sum_{j = 1}^m\sum_{d = 1}^n\sigma(d)[\gcd(i,j) = d]\\ =&\sum_{d = 1}^n\sigma(d)\sum_{i = 1}^{\lfloor n/d\rfloor}\sum_{j = 1}^{\lfloor m / d\rfloor}[\gcd(i,j) = 1]\\ =&\sum_{d = 1}^n\sigma(d)\sum_{i = 1}^{\lfloor n/d\rfloor}\sum_{j = 1}^{\lfloor m / d\rfloor}\sum_{x\mid i\land x \mid j}\mu(x)\\ =&\sum_{d = 1}^n\sigma(d)\sum_{x = 1}^{\lfloor n / d\rfloor}\lfloor n / dx\rfloor\lfloor m/ dx\rfloor\mu(x)\\ \end{aligned} \] ä»¤ \(T = dx\)ï¼Œåˆ™ \[ \begin{aligned} &\sum_{d = 1}^n\sigma(d)\sum_{x = 1}^{\lfloor n / d\rfloor}\lfloor n / dx\rfloor\lfloor m/ dx\rfloor\mu(x)\\ =&\sum_{T = 1}^n\lfloor n / T\rfloor\lfloor m / T\rfloor\sum_{d\mid T}\sigma(d)\mu(T/d) \end{aligned} \] å†ä»¤ \(f(T) = \displaystyle\sum_{d\mid T}\sigma(d)\mu(T/d)\)ï¼Œåˆ™è¦æ±‚çš„ä¸œè¥¿å°±æ˜¯ï¼š \[ \sum_{T = 1}^n\lfloor n / T\rfloor\lfloor m / T\rfloor f(T) \] ç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å‘ç°çš„æ˜¯ï¼šåªæœ‰å½“ \(\sigma(d)\le a\) æ—¶ï¼Œå…¶æ‰ä¼šå¯¹ \(f(T)\) äº§ç”Ÿè´¡çŒ®ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è€ƒè™‘ç¦»çº¿å¤„ç†æ¯ä¸ªè¯¢é—®ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§ \(a\) ä»å°åˆ°å¤§æ’åºï¼Œå†å°†é¢„å¤„ç†å¥½çš„ \(\sigma(d)\) ä»å°åˆ°å¤§æ’åºï¼Œç„¶ååŠ¨æ€æ›´æ–° \(f(T)\) çš„å‰ç¼€å’Œã€‚å¯ä»¥å‘ç°çš„æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬æ¯æ¬¡åŠ å…¥ä¸€ä¸ª \(\sigma(d)\mu(T/d)\) éƒ½ä¼šè®© \(d\) çš„æ¯ä¸ªå€æ•°çš„ \(T\) å¯¹åº”å¢åŠ ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨æ ‘çŠ¶æ•°ç»„ç»´æŠ¤ã€‚å¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªè¯¢é—®æ•´é™¤åˆ†å—å³å¯ã€‚æ€»å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(q\sqrt n\log n + n \log^2 n)\)

#include <cstdio>
#include <cctype>
#include <utility>
#include <algorithm>
#define int long long
#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = a; i <= b; ++i)
#define lowbit(x) ((x) & (-x))
#define Fi first
#define Se second
#define mk(a, b) std::make_pair(a, b)

const int maxn = 1e5 + 13;

struct queries
{
    int n, m, a, id;
} q[20000 + 5];

bool cmp(queries a, queries b) {return a.a < b.a;}

inline int read()
{
    int s = 0, x = 0;
    char c = getchar();
    while (!isdigit(c))
        x |= (c == '-'), c =getchar();
    while (isdigit(c))
        s = 10 * s + c - '0', c = getchar();
    return x ? -s : s;
}

inline int min(int a, int b) {return a < b ? a : b;}

int g[maxn], mu[maxn], vis[maxn], p[maxn], tot;
std::pair<int, int> f[maxn];
int tree[maxn], ans[maxn];

void modify(int x, int val)
{
    for (; x <= maxn - 5; x += lowbit(x))
        tree[x] += val;
    return;
}

int query(int x)
{
    int ret = 0;
    for (; x; x -= lowbit(x))
        ret += tree[x];
    return ret;
}

void pre()
{
    g[1] = mu[1] = 1;
    f[1] = mk(1, 1);
    FOR(i, 2, maxn - 5)
    {
        if (!vis[i])
        {
            vis[i] = 1;
            p[++tot] = i;
            mu[i] = -1;
            f[i] = mk(g[i] = i + 1, i);
        }
        for (int j = 1; j <= tot && i * p[j] <= maxn - 5; ++j)
        {
            vis[i * p[j]] = 1;
            if (i % p[j] == 0)
            {
                g[i * p[j]] = g[i] * p[j] + 1;
                f[i * p[j]] = mk(f[i].Fi / g[i] * g[i * p[j]], i * p[j]);
                mu[i * p[j]] = 0;
                break;
            }
            else
            {
                mu[i * p[j]] = -mu[i];
                f[i * p[j]] = mk(f[i].Fi * f[p[j]].Fi, i * p[j]);
                g[i * p[j]] = p[j] + 1;
            }
        }
    }
}

int solve(int n, int m)
{
    if (n > m) {int t = n; n = m; m = t;}
    int ret = 0;
    for (int l = 1, r; l <= n; l = r + 1)
    {
        r = min(n / (n / l), m / (m / l));
        ret += (query(r) - query(l - 1)) * (n / l) * (m / l);
    }
    return ret;
}

signed main()
{
    pre();
    std::sort(f + 1, f + maxn - 5);
    int Q = read();
    FOR(i, 1, Q)
        q[i].id = i, q[i].n = read(), q[i].m = read(), q[i].a = read();
    std::sort(q + 1, q + 1 + Q, cmp);
    for (int i = 1, j = 1; i <= Q; ++i)
    {
        for (; f[j].Fi <= q[i].a && j <= maxn - 5; ++j)
            for (int k = f[j].Se; k <= maxn - 5; k += f[j].Se)
                modify(k, f[j].Fi * mu[k / f[j].Se]);
        ans[q[i].id] = solve(q[i].n, q[i].m);
    }
    FOR(i, 1, Q) printf("%lld\n", ans[i] % (1LL << 31));
    return 0;
}

Summary

é€‚å½“ä½¿ç”¨ \(T = kd\) è¿›è¡Œæ¢å…ƒã€‚è€ƒè™‘è´¡çŒ®æ˜¯å¦‚ä½•äº§ç”Ÿçš„ç„¶åå°±å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨æ°å½“çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„è¿›è¡Œç»´æŠ¤ã€‚

æ´›è°· P3327 [SDOI2015]çº¦æ•°ä¸ªæ•°å’Œ

Description

è®¾ \(\tau(n)\) è¡¨ç¤º \(n\) çš„çº¦æ•°ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œæ±‚ \[ \sum_{i = 1}^n\sum_{j = 1}^m\tau(ij) \] ### Solution

å¼•ç†ï¼š \[ \tau(ij) = \sum_{x\mid i}\sum_{y\mid j}[\gcd(x, y) = 1] \] è¯æ˜è€ƒè™‘ \(i\) å’Œ \(j\) çš„è´¨å› å­å³å¯ã€‚

åŸå¼ï¼š \[ \begin{aligned} &\sum_{i = 1}^n\sum_{j = 1}^m\tau(ij)\\ =&\sum_{i = 1}^n\sum_{j = 1}^m\sum_{x\mid i}\sum_{y\mid j}[\gcd(x, y) = 1]\\ =&\sum_{x = 1}^n\sum_{y = 1}^m\left\lfloor\frac nx\right\rfloor\left\lfloor\frac my\right\rfloor[\gcd(x,y) = 1]\\ =&\sum_{x = 1}^n\sum_{y = 1}^m\left\lfloor\frac nx\right\rfloor\left\lfloor\frac my\right\rfloor\sum_{d\mid \gcd(x,y)}\mu(d)\\ =&\sum_{d = 1}^{\min\{n,m\}}\mu(d)\sum_{x = 1}^{\left\lfloor\frac nd\right\rfloor}\left\lfloor\frac n{dx}\right\rfloor\sum_{y = 1}^{\left\lfloor\frac md\right\rfloor}\left\lfloor\frac m{dy}\right\rfloor \end{aligned} \] è®¾ \(f(n) = \sum_{1\le i\le n}\left\lfloor\dfrac ni\right\rfloor\)ï¼Œåˆ™åŸå¼è¿›ä¸€æ­¥åŒ–ç®€ä¸º \[ \sum_{d = 1}^{\min\{n,m\}}\mu(d)f\left(\left\lfloor\frac nd\right\rfloor\right)f\left(\left\lfloor\frac md\right\rfloor\right) \] \(f\) çš„å€¼å¯ä»¥ä¸€å¼€å§‹ \(O(n\sqrt n)\) æ±‚å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œç„¶åæ€»çš„å¤æ‚åº¦æ˜æ˜¾ä¸º \(O(n\sqrt n + T\sqrt n)\)

#include <cstdio>
#include <cctype>

inline int read()
{
    char c = getchar();
    int s = 0;
    while (!isdigit(c))
        c = getchar();
    while (isdigit(c))
        s = 10 * s + c - '0', c = getchar();
    return s;
}

typedef long long ll;

inline int min(int a, int b) {return a < b ? a : b;}

const int maxn = 50005;

int mu[maxn], p[maxn], vis[maxn], tot;
ll f[maxn];

void get_mu()
{
    mu[1] = 1;
    for (int i = 2; i <= maxn - 5; ++i)
    {
        if (!vis[i])
        {
            mu[i] = -1;
            p[++tot] = i;
        }
        for (int j = 1; j <= tot && i * p[j] <= maxn - 5; ++j)
        {
            vis[i * p[j]] = 1;
            if (i % p[j] == 0)
            {
                mu[i * p[j]] = 0;
                break;
            }
            mu[i * p[j]] = -mu[i];
        }
    }
    for (int i = 2; i <= maxn - 5; ++i)
        mu[i] += mu[i - 1];
    return;
}

void get_f()
{
    for (int n = 1; n <= maxn - 5; ++n)
        for (int l = 1, r; l <= n; l = r + 1)
        {
            r = n / (n / l);
            f[n] += (r - l + 1ll) * (n / l);
        }
    return;
}

ll solve(int n, int m)
{
    ll ret = 0;
    int up = min(n, m);
    for (int l = 1, r; l <= up; l = r + 1)
    {
        r = min(n / (n / l), m / (m / l));
        ret += (ll)(mu[r] - mu[l - 1]) * f[n / l] * f[m / l];
    }
    return ret;
}

signed main()
{
    get_mu();
    get_f();
    int T = read();
    while (T--)
    {
        int n = read(), m = read();
        printf("%lld\n", solve(n, m));
    }
    return 0;
}

Summary

\[ \tau(ij) = \sum_{x\mid i}\sum_{y\mid j}[\gcd(x, y) = 1] \]

é‡è¦ç»“è®ºã€‚

SPOJ5971 LCMSUM - LCM Sum

Description

\(T\) ç»„æ•°æ®ï¼Œæ±‚ \[ \sum_{i = 1}^n\operatorname{lcm}(i,n)\quad\text{s.t. }1\le T\le 3\times 10^5,1\le n\le 10^6 \]

Solution

å…ˆæ¨å¼å­ï¼š \[ \sum_{i = 1}^n\operatorname{lcm}(i, n) = \sum_{i = 1}^n\frac{in}{\gcd(i,n)} \] è¿™ä¸€æ­¥ç›¸å½“æ˜¾ç„¶ã€‚æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ç”±äºè¿™ä¸ªå¼å­ä¸æ˜¯å¾ˆå¥½å¤„ç†ï¼Œè€Œæˆ‘ä»¬çŸ¥é“ \(\gcd(i, n) = \gcd(n - i, n)\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è€ƒè™‘æŠŠ \(n\) è¿™ä¸€é¡¹æå‡ºæ¥ï¼Œç„¶åå¤åˆ¶ä¸€éå€’åºæ±‚å’Œï¼š \[ =\frac12\left(\sum_{i = 1}^{n - 1}\frac{in}{\gcd(i, n)} + \sum_{i = n - 1}^1\frac{in}{\gcd(n - i, n)} \right) \] åˆå¹¶åˆ†æ¯ç›¸åŒçš„é¡¹ï¼Œ \[ =\frac12\sum_{i = 1}^{n - 1}\frac{n^2}{\gcd(i, n)} + n \] æœ€åè®©è¿™ä¸ªå¼å­å¥½çœ‹ä¸€ç‚¹ï¼š \[ =\frac12\sum_{i = 1}^n\frac{n^2}{\gcd(i, n)} + \frac n 2 \] ç”±äºå¾ˆå¤šçš„ \(\gcd(i, n)\) æ˜¯ç›¸åŒçš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è€ƒè™‘æŠŠå®ƒä»¬å¹¶åœ¨ä¸€èµ·è®¡ç®—ã€‚æšä¸¾ \(\gcd(i, n) = d\)ï¼Œé‚£ä¼šæœ‰å¤šå°‘ä¸ª \(i\) æ»¡è¶³ \(\gcd(i, n) = d\) å‘¢ï¼Ÿæˆ‘ä»¬çŸ¥é“ \(\displaystyle\gcd(i, n) = d\iff \gcd(\frac id, \frac nd) = 1\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æœ‰ \(\phi(\frac nd)\) ä¸ªè¿™æ ·çš„ \(i\) æ˜¯æ»¡è¶³çš„ã€‚ \[ =\frac12\sum_{d|n}\frac{n^2\phi(\frac nd)}{d} + \frac n2 \] æå‡ºä¸€ä¸ª \(n/2\)ï¼Œç„¶åæ¢ä¸€ä¸‹å…ƒ \(d' = n / d\)ï¼Œå¾—åˆ° \[ =\frac 12 n\left(\sum_{d'|n}d'\phi(d') + 1\right) \] ä»¤ \(g(n) = \displaystyle\sum_{d|n}d\phi(d)\)ï¼Œåˆ™æˆ‘ä»¬æœ€ç»ˆè¦æ±‚çš„å°±æ˜¯ \(\displaystyle\frac12(g(n) + 1)\)ã€‚

\(g(n)\) ä¸ºç§¯æ€§å‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯ä»¥çº¿æ€§ç­›åšåˆ° \(O(n)-O(1)\) çš„å¤æ‚åº¦ã€‚ä¸‹é¢è€ƒè™‘å¦‚ä½•çº¿æ€§ç­›å‡º \(g(n)\)ã€‚

é¦–å…ˆå¯¹äº \(n\) ä¸ºè´¨æ•°ï¼Œæ˜¾ç„¶ \(g(n) = 1 + n\phi(n) = 1 + n(n - 1)\)ã€‚

ç„¶åè€ƒè™‘æ­£åœ¨ç”¨ \(i\) æ¥ç­› \(g(i\cdot p_j)\) çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚è‹¥ \(\gcd(i, p_j) = 1\)ï¼Œç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ç§¯æ€§å‡½æ•°çš„æ€§è´¨å³å¯ã€‚

è‹¥ \(p_j|i\)ï¼Œä»¤ \(i = i'\cdot p_j^w\)ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ \(\gcd(i', p_j) = 1\)ï¼Œç„¶åå¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ° \[ \begin{aligned} g(i\cdot p_j) &= g(i')\cdot g(p_j^{w + 1})\\ g(i)&=g(iâ€™)\cdot g(p_j^w) \end{aligned} \] ç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬è€ƒè™‘è®¡ç®— \(g(p_j^k)\)ï¼Œæ˜¾ç„¶åœ°ï¼Œ \[ g(p_j^k) = \sum_{w = 0}^kp_j^w\cdot\phi(p_j^w) \] è€Œ \(\phi(p_j^w) = p_j^{w - 1}\cdot(p_j - 1)\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \[ g(p_j^k) = \sum_{w = 0}^kp_j^{2w-1}(p_j - 1) \] äºæ˜¯ \(g(p_j^{w + 1}) = p_j^{2w + 1}(p_j - 1) + g(p_j^k)\)ã€‚

å›åˆ°ä¹‹å‰çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªå¼å­ï¼Œå°†ä¸¤å¼ç›¸å‡ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ° \[ g(i\cdot p_j) - g(i) = g(i')\cdot p_j^{2w + 1}\cdot(p_j - 1) \] åŒç†ï¼Œç”±äº \(p_j|i\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \[ g(i) - g(\frac{i}{p_j}) = g(i')\cdot p_j^{2w - 1}\cdot(p_j - 1) \] æ‰€ä»¥ä¸¤å¼ç›¸é™¤æ¶ˆå» \(g(i')\)ï¼Œæœ‰ \[ g(i\cdot p_j) = g(i) + \left(g(i) - g(\frac{i}{p_j})\right)\cdot p_j^2 \] æ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬å°±åœ¨ \(O(n + T)\) çš„æ—¶é—´å†…è§£å†³äº†è¿™é¢˜ã€‚

#define FOR(i, a, b) for (int i = a; i <= b; ++i)
#define DEC(i, a, b) for (int i = a; i >= b; --i)

const int maxn = 1e6 + 5;

typedef long long ll;


int p[maxn], flg[maxn], cntp;
ll g[maxn];

int main()
{
    g[1] = 1;
    FOR(i, 2, maxn - 3)
    {
        if (!flg[i]) p[++cntp] = i, g[i] = 1ll * (i - 1) * i + 1;
        for (int j = 1; j <= cntp && i * p[j] <= maxn - 3; ++j)
        {
            flg[i * p[j]] = 1;
            if (i % p[j] == 0)
            {
                g[i * p[j]] = g[i] + (g[i] - g[i / p[j]]) * p[j] * p[j];
                break;
            }
            g[i * p[j]] = g[i] * g[p[j]];
        }
    }
    int T = read();
    while (T--)
    {
        int n = read();
        printf("%lld\n", (g[n] + 1) * n / 2);
    }
    return 0;
}

Summary

  • \(\gcd(i, n) = \gcd(n - i, n)\)ï¼ˆæ›´ç›¸å‡æŸæœ¯ï¼‰
  • å¯¹äºå¾ˆå¤šé¡¹å–å€¼ç›¸ç­‰çš„é¡¹å¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘æå‡ºæ¥ï¼ˆç±»ä¼¼æ•´é™¤åˆ†å—çš„æ€æƒ³ï¼‰
  • å¯¹äºç§¯æ€§å‡½æ•°æ˜¯å¯ä»¥çº¿æ€§ç­›çš„

hdu 4944 FSFâ€™s game

è§ é¢˜è§£ hdu 4944 FSFâ€™s game

ä¸»è¦å°±æ˜¯æŠŠå¥‡å¥‡æ€ªæ€ªçš„ä¸œè¥¿åŒ–ç®€äº†ã€‚æŠŠé—®é¢˜åŒ–å½’åˆ°æ±‚ LCMSUM é‚£é“é¢˜å»ã€‚

BZOJ #3601. ä¸€ä¸ªäººçš„æ•°è®º

è§ é¢˜è§£ BZOJ #3601. ä¸€ä¸ªäººçš„æ•°è®º

ä¸»è¦æ˜¯åŒ–ç®€ä¹‹åå°†è‡ªç„¶æ•°å¹‚ä¹‹å’ŒåŒ–å¼€ç”¨é«˜æ–¯æ¶ˆå…ƒï¼Œä¹‹å \(O(1)\) è®¡ç®—é‚£ä¸ªç§¯æ€§å‡½æ•°çš„å€¼ã€‚

P1829 [å›½å®¶é›†è®­é˜Ÿ]Crashçš„æ•°å­—è¡¨æ ¼ / JZPTAB

Description

\[ \sum_{i = 1}^n\sum_{j = 1}^m\operatorname{lcm}(i, j)\bmod 20101009 \]

Solution

å…ˆæŠŠ lcm å˜æˆ gcdï¼š \[ \sum_{i = 1}^n\sum_{j = 1}^m\frac{ij}{\gcd(i, j)} \] æšä¸¾ gcdï¼š \[ \sum_{d = 1}^n\sum_{i = 1}^n\sum_{j = 1}^m\frac{ij}{d}[\gcd(i,j) = d] \] ç„¶åæ˜¯ç»å…¸å¥—è·¯ï¼š \[ \sum_{d = 1}^nd\sum_{i = 1}^{\lfloor\frac nd\rfloor}\sum_{j = 1}^{\lfloor\frac md\rfloor}ij\sum_{k\mid \gcd(i,j)}\mu(k) \] å†ç„¶åï¼Œæšä¸¾ \(k\)ï¼š \[ \sum_{d = 1}^nd\sum_{k = 1}^{\lfloor\frac nd\rfloor}\mu(k)\sum_{i = 1}^{\lfloor\frac nd\rfloor}\sum_{j = 1}^{\lfloor\frac md\rfloor}ij[k\mid i][k\mid j] \] ä¹‹ååº”è¯¥å°±èƒ½åŒ–ç®€äº†ï¼š \[ \sum_{d = 1}^nd\sum_{k = 1}^{\lfloor\frac nd\rfloor}\mu(k)k^2\sum_{i = 1}^{\lfloor\frac{n}{kd}\rfloor}\sum_{j = 1}^{\lfloor\frac{m}{kd}\rfloor}ij \] åé¢è¿™ä¸ª \(f(x,y)=\sum_{i= 1}^x\sum_{j= 1}^yij\) å¯ä»¥åŒ–ç®€æˆ \(\dfrac{n(n+ 1)m(m+1)}{4}\)ï¼Œç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬æœ€ç»ˆå¾—åˆ°çš„å¼å­å°±æ˜¯ \[ \sum_{d=1}^nd\sum_{k=1}^{\lfloor\frac nd\rfloor}\mu(k)k^2f(\lfloor n/kd\rfloor, \lfloor m/kd\rfloor) \] æˆ‘ä»¬ä»¤ \(S(n,m) = \displaystyle\sum_{k=1}^{\min(n,m)}\mu(k)k^2f(\lfloor n/k\rfloor, \lfloor m/k\rfloor)\)ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªä¸œè¥¿å¯ä»¥å…ˆç­›å‡º \(\mu(n)n^2\) ä¹‹åç”¨æ•´é™¤åˆ†å—æ¥åšã€‚ç„¶åï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬çš„ç­”æ¡ˆæ˜æ˜¾ä¸º \(\displaystyle\sum_{d= 1}^{\min(n,m)}dS(\lfloor n/d\rfloor,\lfloor m/d\rfloor)\)ã€‚å¯ä»¥å†å¥—ä¸€å±‚åˆ†å—æ¥åšã€‚

Implementation

å–æ¨¡å’Œ ll çš„ç»†èŠ‚æ˜¯æœ‰ç‚¹çƒ¦çš„ã€‚

const int maxn = 1e7 + 5, N = 1e7;
int isp[maxn], p[maxn], mu[maxn], cnt;
modint sum[maxn];

void sieve() {
    mu[1] = 1;
    FOR(i, 2, N) {
        if (!isp[i]) p[++cnt] = i, mu[i] = -1;
        for (int j = 1; j <= cnt && i * p[j] <= N; ++j) {
            isp[i * p[j]] = 1;
            if (i % p[j] == 0) break;
            mu[i * p[j]] = -mu[i];
        }
    }
    FOR(i, 1, N) sum[i] = sum[i - 1] + (modint)i * i * mu[i];
}

modint f(int x, int y) {return modint(1ll * x * (x + 1) / 2 % mod) * modint(1ll * y * (y + 1) / 2 % mod);}

modint S(int n, int m) {
    int top = min(n, m);
    modint ans = 0;
    for (int l = 1, r; l <= top; l = r + 1) {
        r = min(n / (n / l), m / (m / l), top);
        ans += (sum[r] - sum[l - 1]) * f(n / l, m / l);
    }
    return ans;
}

int main() {
    sieve();
    int n, m; read(n, m);
    int top = min(n, m);
    modint ans = 0;
    for (int l = 1, r; l <= top; l = r + 1) {
        r = min(n / (n / l), m / (m / l), top);
        ans += (r - l + 1ll) * (l + r) / 2 % mod * S(n / l, m / l);
    }
    print(ans);
    return output(), 0;
}

                f[i][j][1]=(f[i][j][1]+f[i][j-1][0])%mod;
            if(a[j]>a[j-1])
                f[i][j][1]=(f[i][j][1]+f[i][j-1][1])%mod;
        }
